name: Princesa das Nuvens
description: Princesa das Nuvens is a chaotic game where the player controls the knight tasked with protecting a princess. But she has a fragile heart, so while repairing damage to the tower done by enemies, you need to calm the princess down.

name: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled
description: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled is an upcoming first-person horror game based on Brazilian folklore.

name: Metamorphism
description: This map started out for vanilla doom2.exe but we quickly pushed the limits. Several days before release however, the HOM's and VPO's were vaporized with MANY thanks to BSP. QWERTY and stx-Vile are credited with pinpointing them.

name: Lily's Memories
description: Lily is an 8-year-old girl who wakes up in her bed at night, hearing voices and strange sounds. The voices tell her that she is in danger and needs to find something important that she lost (her memories of what happened in that house). Lily discovers that apart from the voices, she sees terrifying creatures that try to capture her.
14/? is an exploration game where you explore strange rooms while walking through doors that lead you to other strange rooms.

name: Pseudoregalia: Jam Ver.
description: When reality feels like it's falling apart, one might retreat to a world in their dreams to escape it. Unfotunately, dreams aren't made to last. Explore a perverse image of noble living. Grow strong, and free those trapped within this rotten dream.

name: Marvel's Avengers Definitive Edition
description:
Assemble your team of Earth’s Mightiest Heroes, embrace your powers, and live your Super Hero dreams.

Marvel’s Avengers is an epic, third-person, action-adventure game that combines an original, cinematic story with single-player and co-operative gameplay*. Assemble into a team of up to four players online, master extraordinary abilities, customize an expansive roster of Heroes, and defend the Earth from escalating threats.

Marvel’s Avengers begins at A-Day, where Captain America, Iron Man, the Hulk, Black Widow, and Thor are unveiling a new, hi-tech Avengers Headquarters in San Francisco. The celebration turns deadly when a mysterious enemy causes a catastrophic accident which results in massive devastation. Blamed for the tragedy, the Avengers disband. Five years later, with all Super Heroes outlawed and the world in peril, a sprawling adventure ignites when a determined young woman named Kamala Khan sets out to reassemble and rebuild the Avengers to stop the unchecked power of the secretive new force known as AIM.

Marvel's Avengers delivers the definitive Avengers gaming experience with an adventure that sends out heroes from space, to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, or an apolcalyptic alternative future.

Assemble a roster of 11 unique heroes and restore their powers; then continue to battle AIM solo or online with friends.
Unlock powerful skills and new gear for each of Earth’s Mightiest Heroes to suit your playstyle.
Flexible combat system, dynamically scaling difficulty, plus customizable gear and skills to support unique playstyles for each Hero.
The Definitive Edition includes over 400 classic, fan-favorite, and all-new original outfits inspired by over 80 years of Marvel history to customize these iconic Heroes.
The Definitive Edition includes all released DLC missions and heroes.

name: Doll's Liminal
description: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.

name: Altf4
description: Minimalist abstract environments join with exploration gaming. The locations are varied and incongruous, often consisting of line art and nearly monochrome pallets. Be warned, visual style takes precedence over functionality making navigation tricky at times.

name: NFL Football
description: NFL Football is a football game based on the American NFL. The player can only participate in exhibition matches and has the choice between 28 teams which differ slightly in speed. Before a play, the player has the option between several tactical approaches (six in offense, seven in defense) and then the player directly controls the active athlete who is marked with an arrow. After a ball throw the control switches to the receiving athlete and the player has to catch it. Punts and kickoffs are automated.

name: Bitter/Sweet Blythe
description:
On their birthday, Bunnie (renameable + pick your pronouns) makes a wish, but will they get more than they bargained for when a bunny-eared being named Blythe shows up to give them their best-ever birthday?

Made in under a month for Yandere Jam 2023.

name: The Graveyard Shift
description:
Created by Melancholy Marionette using Naninovel x Unity.
Based on a script by Reece Shearsmith & Steve Pemberton (Adapted, altered, and added to by Melancholy Marionette).

name: Dawn of the Damned
description: Anxious to attend your job interview at Aurora Antiques, you arrive to discover a room full of melancholy mannequins. One, in particular, captures your interest, drawing you closer.

name: Solipsism Reigns BxG
description: Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

name: Love in Lockdown: Ella version
description:
Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

7 different endings depending on your choices
Casual choices and choices with consequences
The option to rename ELLA and name yourself
Gender-neutral - ELLA will refer to you by your chosen name + 'you' and 'they'
Full (terrible) British voice acting with 2 different voice options to choose from
Mild adult content

name: The Hostage
description: Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

name: Disney's The Lion King: Simba's Mighty Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Woody Woodpecker Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Bullet Butlers: Juudan no Kanata
description: A PSP version Bullet Butlers.

name: Chrono Belt: Ayakashibito & Bullet Butlers Crossover Disc
description: A crossover visual novel by Propeller.

name: ChronoBelt SchwarzOath: Ayakashibito & Bullet Butlers Crossover Disk
description: PSP port.

name: Click Manga: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu 1
description: An interactive comic game based on the series in which the player can make advance the comic story clicking in it. The gameplay is that the player has to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene.

name: Click Manga: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu 2
description: An interactive comic game based on the series in which the player can make advance the comic story clicking in it. The gameplay is that the player has to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene. This game continues the story of the first game in the series.

name: Hikari no Shima: Seven Lithographs in Shining Island
description: Hikari No Shima: Seven Lithograhs in Shining Island is an Action puzzle game set in a lost city in a strange island where the player has to solve different puzzles to advance to the next stage meanwhile he fights against different kind of monsters.

name: Motoko Hime Adventure
description:
A PC-88 visual novel.

Motoko Hime is science fiction writer. After finishing writing a novel she was sucked into the novel and you're the only one who can save her.

name: Pet Shop Monogatari DS 2
description: Japan-only sequel to My Pet Shop.

name: Return of Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: Cops L.A. Police
description: Get behind the badge of real cops and discover the tough life of L.A. police. One moment you’ll be rescuing a cat, the next, you’ll be handling domestic violence, talking a desperate man out of committing suicide, chasing gangsters on a packed highway and much more! Put your investigating, chasing and shooting skills to the test in 9 missions full of hilarious situations and serious action! Get into the shoes of 4 charismatic cops and see how real justice is served. A fun & gripping action mobile game showing cops daily duties: investigating, pursuing and shooting.

name: Oops! All Techbase
description: A 32-Level Megawad, each level Techbase themed.

name: Infection
description: This set of 7 maps should take around 45 to 60 minutes to complete on Ultra-Violence, provided you don't die too often. It is designed to be played in order, but pistol starts are possible with some added difficulty.

name: ToyMaker
description: A creepy lost-media videogame from the past will haunt your dreams.

name: Spire Horizon: Companion Expansion
description: Traveling alone is not difficult at all, but with a companion to solve loneliness, it could be even better. Shared experiences and lasting memories make the journey more fulfilling. Solo travel offers freedom, while accompanied travel provides companionship.

name: Slimeria
description: Welcome to Slimeria, an exciting adventure game set in Middle-earth! your mission is to overcome various challenges and find the golden goblet that will give you the strength to free the villages from the clutches of darkness.

name: Cecelia
description: A mysterious island. A giant baby made of stone awakens. Learn to trust each other if you want to explore the perilous terrain, seeking answers from the island's enigmatic call and an ominous force awaiting you in the distant lighthouse.

name: A Nest for Us
description: Fly through the forest collecting twigs to build your nest with in this minimalistic, nature-inspired platformer.

name: Absurd Story: Back Home
description: A runaway wanderer, a frail Taoist priest, who want to return to their hometown at the end of the world. But when they step into the empty city, they are swept into the dead ruins…

name: Abyssey
description:
Abyssey is a strategy log-like game with Pixel Horizontal Scroll View!
Get jewelry and get a job! You get one job depending on the jewelry you're wearing!
Depending on your job, you will be able to use your own basic attacks and skills!
There are a total of 16 jobs, and you can experience new plays every time!
You can also gain item synergies, and item synergies can earn additional skills and stats to complement your job skills!
You can strengthen your items to make your current skills and synergy stronger!
There are more than 60 items. Try combine them in a variety of ways!
And, Beat enemies and bosses by creating my own synergy combination!

name: Chinese Chess Wargame
description: This is a new game based on the expansion of the traditional Chinese chess game "Chinese Chess". It not only retains the basic rules of the original Chinese chess, but also adds new war chess elements. You should be able to get started quickly. Take the challenge to become the new master.

name: Click Dungeon
description: This is a turn-based strategy game, Train your fighter, carefully select equipment for him, carefully select the target of attack, and meet the coming elite monsters, Defeat monsters to get loot and improve combat power! Form a team of fighters to fight various bosses!

name: Crossroads: What Was Lost - Collector's Edition
description: When Eden struggles to find direction after a devastating loss, Crossroads and bartender Mistress Eve appear just in the nick of time! Eden's love of fairy tales and legends makes these three spine-tingling fables the perfect way to set them on the right path. So, are you up to the challenge?

name: Cyber Prison Management
description: You are tasked with managing 8 prisoners in a flying space prison for 30 days with your camera system. You'll need to manage the stock market, hostile ships, and keep prisoners in line. Or play as one of the prisoners, hiding and trying to escape. But be careful - danger is always around the corner.

name: Laruaville 14
description: Touch the Oriental Wisdom from the ancient sage himself and build him a town!

name: Girls Divers
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Don't Not Live
description: Don't Not Live is a precision platformer where you can dash in any direction. Climb to the top of the afterlife to meet god and receive the special prize for completing his hellish obstacle course.

name: Love Story
description: It is a simple Tsukkur story game with a high proportion of events. Depending on the choices made in the game, various endings and the development of the story in the middle will change. Some objects show slightly different stories depending on the number or order of selection.

name: Mandemon
description: Decaying Japanese school buildings, a series of bizarre incidents, eerie Mandemon legends. Lies and truths intertwine, love and hate entwined in the mist. What should one do? Whom should one believe? Welcome to this cruel world filled with deception and harm —

name: Game in Game in Game
description: An escape room game fanatic finds themselves in an escape room of their own creation. Now, they have to find a way to escape their own bedroom!

name: Lovecraftian Bundle
description: Immerse yourself in the terrifying universe of H.P. Lovecraft with this bundle.

name: Shadowblade Odyssey
description:
"Shadowblade Odyssey" is an enchanting 2D platform adventure game that draws inspiration from the classic retro Shadow style. Embark on a thrilling journey through a mysterious phantasmal world, where players take on the role of a young hero.

In this game, players must skill fully evade cunningly placed traps and employ their mastery of blades and darts to vanquish enemies. However, combat is not the only approach; players can also learn potent shapeshifting abilities to conceal themselves within the shadows, quietly elude adversaries, and seek out hidden treasures.

Players can exchange their hard-earned currency to acquire new abilities, upgrade their existing skills, and unlock powerful enhancements for their character. Whether it's improving the effectiveness of their blades and darts, extending the duration of their shapeshifting ability, or acquiring unique and rare skills.

name: Drift City
description: Drift City is a retro arcade racing game that lets the player race around a slalom track in a sports car. Test different cars and collect power ups to set faster times each lap.

name: Underworld Defense
description:
Demons always torture humans. Now, in afterlife, humans has a chance to revenge.
Underworld defense is third person tower defense game in which you have spawning grounds instead towers where you can call your army to help defending your gate.

name: The Panic Room: House of Secrets
description: A hidden object game featuring an exciting detective plot, realistic graphic and atmospheric music.

name: Towerful
description: Build up your armada of artillery towers and defend the lands of Tulraak and Arcton from invading battleships whose only goal is to break through your barriers and steal your planet's resources!

name: Kurt '99: The Football Manager
description: Kurt '99: The Football Manager - The perfect soccer manager for young and old. Game depth and fun guaranteed. Kurt puts football back in the spotlight.

name: Max Beyond
description: Max Beyond is a third person action adventure game with elements of stealth, combat and tactical gameplay layered with a cinematic story bursting with twists and turns.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
description: A SFW port to Nintendo Switch.

name: Yakuza: Like a Dragon - Management Mode Set
description: The Yakuza: Like a Dragon - Management Mode Set includes three sets of employees that can be added to the Management Mode roster.

name: Gord: Deluxe Edition
description: Gord is a dark-fantasy, adventure-strategy game set in a hostile land inspired by Slavic mythology. Besieged by vile creatures, you must build to survive. But to prevail, you must conquer the darkness beyond the gates. Command the Tribe of the Dawn and lead the conquest that will shape the kingdom.

name: Yakuza: Like a Dragon - Karaoke Set
description: The Yakuza: Like a Dragon - Karaoke Set adds a variety of classic and new karaoke songs to the jukebox in the Survive Bar, a key location in the game.

name: Ozymandias: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tail & Trails
description: A short exploration game where you and your magical pets take a walk on one fine evening.

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
In this set:
- The main game
- Digital Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Season Pass (featuring 3 Additional Episodes)
- Season Pass Bonus: Hallowed Relic Sword Mountings (Equipment)

name: Doraemon Gadget Rush
description:
Help Doraemon take back his future gadgets from alien techno-thieves!
Blast the aliens to bits by forming a string of same colored gems on the game board. Form as many gem combos as you can within a given time limit! Chain combos to unleash Fever Time and look for rare power-ups for more points and damage. Unlock Doraemon's friends to help him in battle. Level-up and equip powerful weapons with unique boosts. Defeat all the aliens and retrieve all of Doraemon's 42 stolen future gadgets!

name: Robots Runner
description:
Description Run with your robot into a dark abandoned factory! But beware an infinite path of dangers, put your personal best! avoid the enemies and not fall from the platform if you will not immediately end your adventure.
Your robot is able to jump the platforms with incredible leaps but is also equipped with a "G" device capable of reversing gravity! you find yourself running upside down! use this trick to avoid the big obstacles you encounter on your ride.

name: Hollow Victory
description: "Hollow Victory!" is a short visual novel about visiting your ex in jail after he tried taking over the world...

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - The Makeover Collection
description:
Contents:
-Cosmetics set (Magical Makeup, Hair Catalog)
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
-Luxury Wedding Attire Set ( White, Pink, Blue )
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 3
description: Can Sweet Shoreline win the idol competition and save the cafe?

name: Frozen Synapse
description:
Frozen Synapse brings the simultaneous turn-based strategy genre bang up-to-date and lets you give detailed, accurate orders to your squad: classic gameplay with a modern interface.

Plan your moves, test them out, then hit the "Prime" button: both you and your enemy's turns are executed simultaneously.

Competitive-but-intuitive multiplayer and a huge single player campaign mean that Frozen Synapse will give you hours and hours of tactical delight.

name: Santa's Giftship Reloaded
description:
Help Santa and the elves save Christmas!!
The first sign of trouble arose when Krampus thought he could do a better job than good ole St. Nick and things steadily got worse from there. Now a third of the North Pole has turned into angry, envious elves deceived by Krampus, Santa’s evil twin. They are attempting to shut down Christmas! Early reports are coming in of elf operatives aligning with dissenters nearing Santa's workshop. Reinforcements are headed to the scene as well but will it be soon enough? Will the children be left with nothing but coal?! It is up to you to help Santa save Christmas. Elf Suit up! Don’t let these evil forces choose a counterfeit and prevail with their cries.
The critics of the controversial Frostmaster BL19 Sleigh will be eating crow tomorrow...

name: Witch's Garden
description: Falling in love, the world begins to change.

name: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Rush
description:
Get ready for some Strawberry Shortcake fun!
Strawberry and her friends want to bake fruitilicious cakes, but they need your help!
Run, slide and leap through the wonderful world of Berry Bitty City and grab all the strawberries, cherries, oranges and other yummy fruit you can find!
Then it’s time to decorate your cake, and snap a picture to show your friends!
Collect as many sticker packs as you can and fill the amazing sticker book!
Play as Strawberry Shortcake or one of her friends! Look: Cherry Jam, Orange Blossom, Blueberry Muffin, Lemon Meringue, Raspberry Torte, Plum Pudding and Huckleberry Pie… they’re all here!

Run along with the super-adorable and cute puppy pals! Every day is a special occasion for Strawberry Shortcake, and that calls for a fresh and fruity look. Each character has her own set of stylish outfits.
Come join the fun and play Strawberry Shortcake’s berry exciting Berry Rush adventure!

name: Hoodsters
description: Play as Tommy and see how far you can get through the magical forest and the Sky Kingdom. Use your special powers to get you further and keep your cool to be able to beat your best friends score and brag to the world!

name: Ultimate Gem
description: Sin descripción

name: Trapped in the Kanal
description: I got locked in the keep-out area in a waterway The quiet sound of water flow makes me uncomfortable I need get out of here……

name: Windstorm: Double Pack
description:
Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship
Discover the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she tries to befriend the black stallion called Windstorm.

Windstorm: An Unexpected Arrival
Experience the story of Ari as she arrives in the Alpine area and quickly befriends Windstorm. Together they will go on exciting horse riding adventures and discover the true meaning of friendship!

name: Flicklash
description: Flicklash is an addictive arcade game in which you control a cursor using a simple pull and release mechanic.

name: Bloku!
description: Bloku! is a unique interpretation of the classic block puzzles. Draw and erase blocks from the board. Try to clear as many lines as possible without letting the blocks surpass the top. Get ready to the newest addicting block puzzle!

name: The Scientists' Secret: Hidden Object Game
description: Can you find all the differences in the scenes? Discover them to unveil the mysteries of the scientists, only then you will know what has happened in their research.

name: Alien Tower
description:
Arcade game requiring precision and anticipation.
Fun, simple and hot, welcome to Alien Tower!

name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot - Extended Edition
description:
Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.
Even the tiniest coin can prove vital in this adventure. Remember – the only weapon at your disposal is your mind!

name: Hyper Torque Racing
description:
Be the wind on the circuit! A real racer experience with simple visuals! That's Hyper Torque Racing.
Move the kart with just the accelerator, brake, and steering wheel. The simplified driving operations give you a deep, authentic racer experience you can enjoy.

name: Moto Rush GT: Gold Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Grip Collection #1 with:
-4 new motorbikes (each with special colors)
-New colors for the rest of motorbikes
-New colors for gloves
-Special, Golden colors for motorbikes
-four pairs of brand-new, high-quality racing gloves. Each pair is designed not only to upgrade your control, but also to boost your rider's aesthetics. Feel the real rush!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Character Pass 2
description:
Character Pass 2 contains three DLC Character Packs, each containing three playable characters, for a total of nine playable characters!

Includes:
- Character Pack 4: The Battle of Onigashima Pack
- Character Pack 5
- Character Pack 6
- One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Onigashima Battle Law Costume (Character Pass 2 Bonus)

name: Nestor the Nesting Bird
description:
Keep Nestor the Nesting Bird laying eggs on the highest nests of the tree. Use your aiming skills to shoot an egg into the nest, let it hatch, and have a new Nestor bird try for the next nest! Don't let those pesky bugs and the unpredictable wind break your egg!

Test your precision and timing in two fun game modes and challenge your friends to reach the highest branch. Keep collecting coins and unlock different types of funny eggs!

name: Gravitas!
description: In this fast paced puzzle-shooter mash-up, you are the captain of the defense force of Gravitas, a peaceful galaxy far away from Earth. One day a wormhole appears in the center of Gravitas and begins raining debris and trash into the atmosphere of the galaxy’s various planets. To defend against the invasion, you must match three or more of the same types of trash and launch them back into the wormhole. Hit the wormhole with enough debris to save each planet. Complete all 20 levels to eventually uncover the source of the wormhole and shut it down.

name: 4Spaces
description:
If you want to detach from your busy life, stress relief this colouring game might help you there. 4Spaces is an addictive puzzle game, it is based on applying Voronoi diagram and four colour theorem. The goal of the game is to fill up the cells with 4 different colours, until entire screen is coloured. Two Cells can not have same colour if they share a common border.

4Spaces may seem easy at first, but it quickly turns into an addicting, brain-twisting challenge. It has 12 unique levels - Hours of mind-bending fun!

name: Shuffle in One
description: Shuffle in One is a physics puzzle that your goal is simple : Knock all targets out of arena in one move only! You may adjust the speed of your polygons/circles, and set spin for polygons. Your are allowed to launched your polygons/circles once only! Beside you and target polygons/circles, there are some other types of objects such as blocks, traps and heaters.

name: Solve & Roll
description:
Download and try the free demo! Try the first 20 levels for free!
Make clever use of shapes by building bridges, towers, ramps, loops, slides, catapults, and more, all to guide a little green ball to a shiny gold star.
Place the shapes correctly to reveal the satisfying solutions to over 200 clever physics puzzles, ranging from the pleasingly simple to the deeply challenging. Can you solve them all?

name: Golf Star
description:
Introducing Golf Star, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Enjoy exciting Perfect Swings with golfers from all over the world!
Enjoy the high-quality online authentic golf game Golf Star right now!

name: Sweets and Swipes
description:
Feed the Sweet Tooth! He’s upset without sweets!
Swipe the candies as fast as possible, and they’ll go directly into his mouth.
The more you feed him, the sooner you get new sweets!
Go to the factory and improve production to feed Sweet Tooth faster. And don’t forget to pamper him with delicacies and add fillers to earn more!

name: Grow Beets Clicker
description:
Are you ready to play Beet Growers? The plant farming game filled with colour, candy and adventure! Meet the Beet Buddies! They are like birds - they hatch from eggs, and each of them is unique. Beet Buddies have a sweet tooth, and that's why they like sweets and candy most of all! Feed the Beet Buddies and watch them evolve and grow.
Beet Buddies love to dress up - put some funny clothes on them to create your own beet story!

name: Fliggles Rescue Adventure
description:
Everyone needs a hero!
Fliggles Rescue Adventure is an addictively fun platform-type game that appeals to all ages. The colorful artwork, fun & lively music (headphones recommended), and exciting game play will have you hooked from the first screen. Fliggles Rescue Adventure is easy to learn, yet challenging to master as the levels and chapters become progressively more difficult. Fliggles Rescue Adventure has brought laughter and delight to all that have tried it, truly ‘Fantastic Fun for all’.

name: Puzzle Bonsai
description: Puzzle Bonsai is a fresh and relaxing puzzle game where you take on the challenge of combining parts of the puzzle tree to form a correct equation. An excellent way to keep your thinking nimble every day of the year!

name: Blendoku
description:
A puzzle game that will challenge your ability to distinguish and arrange colors. The game is based on color principles and exercises taught in art schools around the world.

Try and beat the world average, beat your personal best, or go for a perfect score for those perfectionists out there!

name: Penalty Soccer 2012
description:
You cannot know Robert Baggio, Del Piero, Cristiano Ronaldo, Diego Maradona, neither know Juventus, Real Madrid, Manchester United,and even Brazil team, but you shouldn’t deny playing the game Penalty soccer 2012.
Penalty soccer 2012 is a simulation game of the real soccer.
The game will bring you into a decision on the fate of the soccer, which you can feel the moment be a life-and-death matter.

name: The Return of the Heroes
description:
The monsters attacked the Castle wyk and have kidnapped the Princess!
Heroes, join the battle, occupy the farms, summon the soldiers of God, find the way to victory and rescue the princess!

name: Cell to Singularity: Evolution
description:
Tap into the extraordinary tale of evolution in this cosmic clicker game!
Once upon a time, over 4.5 billion years ago, there was no life in the Solar System. And then, almost in the blink of an eye on the geologic time scale, everything changed. Deep in the primordial soup on Earth lay the organic compounds that would give rise to life’s humble origins. All it takes for this epic evolution game to unfold is you.
Turn to the next page of evolution with every click. Gain entropy to unlock the next chapter of the evolution of life. Uncover twists and turns that led to the great milestones of life evolution: the extinction of the dinosaurs, the discovery of fire, the Industrial Revolution, and more. See chapters that have yet to be written -- a future evolution beyond the modern day.

name: Dual Chroma: Haereticus
description:
As a scribe, you serve in subterranean tombs. You once adored a different version of Him before His transformation. Now, as He calls you to the Cerean Hall, how will you respond?

A glimpse into the shadows of Aradal ages past. Haereticus is short experience set in the Dual Chroma universe made for OA2A jam.

name: Swordash
description: Get ready to defend your home against a horde of insane enemies in this epic adventure! A mysterious girl has returned, and it's up to you to stop the invasion. Show off your bravery and become the ultimate hero!

name: Space Gate Rush
description:
In Gate Rush your mission is to land on all space Dock stations and then rush to Mothership’s gate. Do you have what it takes?
Earn in-game currency from landing on space Dock stations and going through the gate. Protect yourself from scary space monsters bent on destroying your beautiful spaceship! Invest the in-game currency in new space ships with more boost and power ups!
Easy to play but hard to master means you will be coming back again and again.

name: Mission To Mars 3D
description:
Fly to Mars and drive your rover to probe for water and organic molecules! Navigate the terrain without taking too much damage and within the limit of your power cells. Feel your way around with robotic arm and two probe fingers.
Features the latest in advanced 3D rendering, physics, and high quality interactions, high resolution textures and attention to modeling detail of the rover vehicle, arm, terrain, and planets.

name: Metal Mission 2015: Dino Island
description: An evil force holds an island, where they revived Jurassic dinosaurs with a mysterious technology, and use them as their super-weapons! You will break into the enemy's camp alone, go through heavy fires, and ultimately save the world!

name: Fairytale Thief: The Goldfish
description:
One fine morning a lavish palace appears out of thin air.

Not unheard of in a magical world, but still a curious event.

Rumours travel fast, and they say the fabled wish-granting golden fish is being held prisoner inside its own creation.

Sounds like a job for a phantom thief!

name: Hentai Uni 2
description: Hentai Uni 2 is a sequel to our last year's hit. Luckily, you can still play it with one hand only. In HU2 you'll get to see both old and completely new characters.

name: Eroblast: Playful Edition
description: You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Fubuki: Fubuki's Luckiest Day
description: The second DLC for Master Detective Archives: Rain Code is a substory that features protagonist Fubuki Clockford, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Time Leap."

name: Counter Delta 2: Eastern Crisis
description:
War clouds begin to gather over the Eastern European region. A single-player TPS game that fights against terrorists around the world!
“Counter Delta 2: Eastern Crisis”is a solo single player/Third-Person Shooter.
Team up with our soldiers to complete the battlefield mission.
Enjoy a thrilling TPS game with a diverse play mode and various weapons that can be unlocked by leveling up.

name: Brotato + Space Gladiators Bundle
description:
Enjoy two games from Blobfish with this bundle!

Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

Ever dreamt of being a space potato? Now’s your chance! Space Gladiators is a 2D hand-drawn roguelite platformer following a bunch of captives fighting their way out of a planet prison. Defeat hordes of aliens in the gladiatorial arenas and earn your freedom!

name: Canvas of Kings
description: Canvas of Kings is a minimalistic mapmaking tool that focuses on randomness and auto-generated elements on user-definable and interactive paths and plots.

name: Please Leave a Message
description: Please Leave a Message is a 2D puzzle game where the player finds themselves in the role of delirious man named Schitz Mann, as he crawls through an underground, labyrinthine facility.

name: Hentai World: Definitive Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Snake Jump
description: You're a snake who is tired of living on the ground. You wanna explore the sky and go as high as you can. Take on a thrilling obstacle cours and a beautiful mystery awaits you at the top...

name: Spell Disk Survivor
description: "Spell Disk Survivor" is one of the game modes in "Spell Disk" where you survive against the endless waves of enemies. Craft overpowering builds using synergizing items and unlock new powers!

name: Eukarion Tales: Origins
description: A retro-flash, isometric RPG set in a medieval fantasy world. Battle hordes of enemies, upgrade your abilities, and experience a deep, fantasy-filled storyline in a European Middle Age-inspired world!

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Definitive Edition
description:
Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

You play as multiple characters, each with their own story, and travel to actual locations in town and dark versions of them.
In this nightmare, you have to solve the murder, search for your missing sister Sarah, and complete the mysterious ritual to save the dying town. Will you be able to unravel all the dark secrets of Boreal Tenebrae?

name: Call of Farming
description: A game for you to create your own farming or simulation game. It includes an inventory, craft, building, growing plants, farm animals and much more.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Tail Concerto Costume Pack
description:
A dramatic simulation RPG depicting a pursuit rife with hope and despair!

This costume pack features the 12 children in police officer and sky pirate attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Costumes" in the Options menu.

name: Fashion Friends: Special Edition
description:
Fashion is better together with your friends!

Become a stylist to the models, actresses and fashion girls! Play a mix of classic arcade games where you have to cut the picture in a new game aimed for children and adults alike.

name: Cooking Arena
description: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!

name: Battle of Tarlis
description: "Battle of Tarlis" is game where you explore many areas to get the best gear or highest level to defeat bosses or survive the hardest zones!

name: They Linger
description: Navigate the narrow hallways in the darkness to find and rescue Jessica and survive the infinite Labyrinth.

name: Wind Love
description: Visual novel in Japanese style. An exciting story with four endings, a huge number of choices, 10+ CGs, 5+ BGs, original music and animated sprites of the main characters will allow you to immerse yourself in a cruel world of deceit and sincerity..

name: Horror Loop
description: Horror Loop, made with a new generation game engine with a deep, impressive and original story, is waiting for you!

name: Soluble Dream
description: Soluble Dream is a visual novel for adults only. Venture into a world of passion, temptation and mystery. Starring Jackson Taylor, a brilliant programming student who must make tough decisions while guarding his reputation and struggling with himself.

name: Only Down
description: Only Down was made with speed runners in mind. Your skill will be tested. Victories are gained by the inch in this unforgiving puzzle platformer.

name: Void Runner
description: Live the dream of being a parkour runner in a world where clouds are not the limit!! Run, climb, explore the void world and reach the space, but do not fall, The higher you go, the harder it gets .

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Medieval Mayhem
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Medieval themed tables filled with cannons that will blast you to the past!

name: D.C. III PS: Da Coda III - Plus Story
description:
The sakura that bloomed year-round is now a thing of the past and Hatsune Island is now known as an island that shows the beauty of each season.

Kiyotaka is a second-year student at Kazami Academy who is part of the news club along with the school idol Rikka, his younger sister-like childhood friend Himeno, his mixed-race cousin Charles, a hard-working junior who skipped a grade and is in his class Sara, and energetic in spirit but weak in body Aoi.

Unlike in the past, there are no more mysterious things happening on the island. That was until one winter day when the sakura began to bloom. All the news club members got a message on their cell phones telling them to do something at a promised place when the sakura begins to bloom. They couldn’t make out the rest of the message but are surprised that it was dated 1951. Rikka was extremely curious about the message and the sudden blooming of the sakura, so she called on everyone to solve the mystery with her.

name: Evil Officer
description: Escape the haunted house before the vengeful "Evil Officer" claims you. Only 5 days, cunning, and stealth will save you. Can you survive the horror and outsmart the relentless pursuit? Beware, he hears everything!

name: Survivors of the Plague
description: Survive against the Scarlet Plague in an action-packed survival roguelike.

name: Shin Galaxy: Engage
description: Shin Galaxy: Engage is an action game with RPG elements in a top-down perspective, where you control spaceships and tries to survive as much as possible in the stages. Improve performance, change appearance and unlock new ships to get as far as you can.

name: GoHome
description: No matter how far you go, never forget the direction home. In this game, your only objective is to go home.

name: Jaden & Jasmine: Lost Memories
description: It's been exactly one month since Jaden Black was shot and betrayed by Jasmine Miles. Did she complete her mission? Well in Lost Memories you not only find that out, but you find out what Harmony's motive was. This game follows the events of the first game Jaden & Jasmine: The Curse of Deception.

name: Lethal Operation: Episode 3 - Lethal Arms of Justice
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayarigami: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayarigami 3: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayarigami 2: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Have Fun Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Keltika
description: Keltika is a story driven economic strategy game inspired by celtic myths and history. Ancient druid magic, power of the celtic gods or even perseverance and knowledge of your people - only you choose the way to conquer Keltika!

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Rimeblood Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai: Young Valkyries
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Adventure Clicker
description: Sin descripción

name: Raindrop Sprinters
description: Avoid rain, get stars, and run across the passage!

name: Koi suru Kanojo no Bukiyou na Butai

name: Wash Simulator: Clean Garage, House, Cars Business Tycoons
description: Welcome to the ultimate cleaning adventure, where cleanliness is your path to success! In Wash Simulator, you're the savvy entrepreneur, ready to conquer the world of washing and cleaning.

name: LanguageGuessr
description: Browser based language guessing game in which players guess off audio clips.

name: Survival Nation: Lost Horizon
description: Survival Nation: Lost Horizon is an open-world, top-down zombie survival game. Keep yourself and other survivors alive in a world gone to the zombies, upgrade your gear and skills, and keep civilization going in a world where humans are the top pick on the menu.

name: Sorrow Asylum
description: Sorrow Asylum is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: Echoes of Karma
description: Echoes of Karma is a game about a flirty demon and gay magician who travel the multiverse. As they travel, they discover a threat known as Glitch. The game is a turn based RPG, but with Blocking Mechanics during the enemy turn. Save TP by skipping your turn to use higher level abilities!

name: Battery Hunter
description: "Battery Hunter" is a 2D pixel-art style linear level game where player must ensure their ability to defeat the final boss.

name: Nexus War: Civilization
description: Sin descripción

name: Tanks
description: Sin descripción

name: Eden: World Builder Simulator
description: A 2016 mobile game based on the British television series Eden.

name: Brick Hero Clash
description: Sin descripción

name: Goddess Era: Paradise Oath
description: Sin descripción

name: Bouncing Rainbow
description: Sin descripción

name: I See You
description: Sin descripción

name: Westland Cowboy: Rodeo Rider
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Toss
description: Sin descripción

name: Hangman
description:
Enjoy the hangman game on your mobile or tablet! This gallow classic game is suitable for all ages, especially for those adults who want to practice their language skills and vocabulary or kids learning new words. The classic hangman for your device. Play the game with the stickman.

Hangman comes also with a 2 player mode where you can write your own word and play with your friends and family. Choose a word and enjoy the game with unlimited words. They will have to guess it using hints. Really fun mode!

name: Fortress Saga
description:
Get ready to join Fortress Saga and hop on the adventure of Cor and Louis - the seed filled with the power of life and the descendant of an honored hero!
As you gather allies, you’ll customize your fortress to your own taste and explore dungeons in vast worlds. Defeat your enemies and grow stronger even faster! Plus, the chemistry between heroes and eye-catching graphics will keep you engaged and wanting more.
So what are you waiting for? In Fortress Saga, anything is possible, so come and let your imagination run wild!

name: My Fishing Boat
description: Explore many seas fishing and discovering treasures... and other surprises!

name: Minecranker
description: Crank the mines

name: Red Titans
description: Red Titans is a single player vertical shoot em up, use the resources available to stop the threat, you will have to be very skillful since there are no continues.

name: Esports Heroes
description: Become a pro esports athlete, scrim to improve, team up with four other players, and reach the top of professional esports. Become a legend in this first-ever idle RPG in the world of pro esports!

name: The Shapeshifter
description: Are you ready for an unforgettable adventure? 'The Shapeshifter' is an 8-bit classic point and click adventure game for the original Game Boy and other compatible systems. In this game, you will become Elliot, an ordinary person spending the weekend in the mountains with friends. But what was supposed to be a peaceful camping trip turns into an incredible fantasy world full of humour and mystery.

name: F1 Championship Season 2000
description: Game Boy Color port of F1 Championship Season 2000.

name: Hype: The Time Quest
description: Game Boy Color port of Hype: The Time Quest.

name: Parallel
description: Parallel is a vast sci-fi universe with five factions battling for home. Assemble a deck and take the fight to Earth.

name: The Shapeshifter 2
description: Welcome to the world of "The Shapeshifter 2 - Become the Animal You Touch" by Green Boy Games, the second part of the trilogy that has taken the Game Boy community by storm! In this unique and original Old-School Adventure game, you'll join Elliot on a mission to save the Elven world from the wizard's spell. Armed with a great power to become any animal he touches, Elliot must race against time as the powers run out at dawn.

name: Infernal Wave
description: It's an intense cooperative survival shooter that pits a team of up to five players against endless waves of zombies. As the last line of defense in a post-apocalyptic world, players must work together to strategize, survive, and take down the hordes.

name: Fandominion
description: Battle it out as your chosen champion to prove who has the best fandom! 2-4 players can fight across multiple venues in this brawler party game. Attack other champions, avoid stage hazards, and win minigames! Decide which nerd will come out on top and which fandom is superior in Fandominion!

name: Camera Anima
description: The Artisan, one of one of Awyr's most infamous killers, is said to walk the cloudy streets looking for his next masterpiece. Pursue the Artisan, save your sister, and uncover the past, but remember what the stories say…Meet his face, and never wake again.

name: X-Men: Mutant Academy
description:
The Game Boy Color port of X-Men: Mutant Academy.

Similar to its PlayStation counterpart, X-Men: Mutant Academy on the Game Boy Color is a fighting game showcasing Marvel's well-known mutants. Recognising the inherent hardware limitations, the stages in this version have been crafted in 2D, and there are notable differences in gameplay.

The character roster features four X-Men (Cyclops, Wolverine, Storm, and Gambit) and five villainous Mutants (Magneto, Toad, Mystique, Sabretooth, and Pyro). Additionally, there are two secret characters, and their unlocking codes are disclosed upon completing the game's story mode.

Beyond the story mode, where a single character faces off against others in consecutive battles, there are various modes such as training, battle (with teams of three characters), survival (one character taking on all others with only a single bar of health), and a versus mode using the Game Link cable.

The Game Boy's two buttons handle kicks and punches (or basic mutant abilities like Cyclops' eye beam). During a fight, a rage bar gradually fills, enabling the use of potent special attacks activated through specific button combinations.

name: Doki Doki Corrupted Files
description: With the files corrupted, and a looming threat on the loose, our crew find themselves in a precarious situation. Set during a decaying act 4, you'll witness a short story that introduces brand new concepts to the all-too well-known story of the Literature Club.

name: Penguin Armada
description: Survival game taking place in dystopian future where AI is taking over. Interact with the heroes through live streaming sessions and be part of the unfolding adventure.

name: Worldwide Soccer
description: A Brazilian version of Tony Meola's Sidekicks Soccer without the sponsorship by the player. The game itself has no modifications from the original version.

name: Ramos Ruy no World Wide Soccer
description: A Japanese version of Tony Meola's Sidekicks Soccer, but with a different player endorsement.

name: Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups
description:
Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups is an unreleased action game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the film, Beethoven's 2nd. An entirely different Beethoven's 2nd game was released around the same period for the Super NES. It was featured at Winter CES 1993.

A prototype of the Mega Drive version was released by Hidden Palace on January 1, 2022.

name: Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper!
description: Beethoven: The Ultimate Canine Caper is an unreleased Game Gear action platform game developed by Unexpected Development and scheduled to be published by Hi-Tech Expressions.

name: Kingdom of Paradise
description: Experience Kingdom of Paradise originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: NieR Re[in]carnation: The Sun and the Moon
description: Also known as Season 2 from NieR Re[in]carnation, The Sun and the Moon is the second story arc of this game revolving around high school students Hina Akagi and Yuzuki Kurezome traversing The Cage. This arc differs from the first in that the player chooses which character to play at the start through a series of questions, and the selected character's stories are explored at the end of each chapter. With this update, new characters, areas, and events joined the world of NieR Re[in]carnation.

name: Ray Mohawk's Manic Monday
description: Ray Mohawk is a 100% vanilla-compatible mini-episode for Doom 2. 6 maps of fun and sun to blaze through - engaging, but never unfair. Despite having a bit of a beachy theme, these maps are mostly Classic Doom, just like momma used to make, but with a dash of palm trees, bright blue skies and a cruisy, light-hearted soundtrack.

name: Ray Mohawk 2: Ray Wreaks Havoc!
description: Ray is BACK and ready for more vanilla-compatible action in the tropics! This is a community project and sequel to my older wad, Ray Mohawk's Manic Monday.

name: Skulltiverse
description:
Skulltiverse is a community project built around constrains in both playable space and build time. Each map was mostly completed within a week.

The wad contains 32 maps split into 6 themes - Techbase, Corrupt Techbase, Ruins, Marble Hell, Fleshy Hell and Void.

name: Acción Rescate
description:
Panrico and BetyByte have launched a game, 'Acción Rescate', in which there are six mini-games framed in each of the continents, Europe, Africa, America, Oceania, Asia and Antarctica, where the players — surely fans of buns Panrico—should save the lives of endangered animals.

Elephants, seals, tigers, wolves, koalas, all of them depend on your effort and desire to save the planet and the ecosystem in which they live. The African jungle, the European rivers, the frozen sea of Antarctica are full of animals that need the help of the Action Rescue Team, a group dedicated to saving various animal species in danger of extinction.

Each player will have to lead their character —be it Darren, Lia, Shasa, Kumo, Marvin or Veruka— through the different continents saving as many animals as possible. If you finally achieve the objective, each player will be able to get a diploma in which they will be recognized as an active member of the Rescue Action Team.

name: Skull Jones
description: Skull Jones tells the story of a badass ladybug trying to change the natural selection of his habitat, where everyone judges his species as fragile.

name: Acción Rescate: América
description: One of the 6 CD's that contains the America minigame.

name: Sapo Xulé and the Unwanted Marriage
description: Sapo Xulé and the Unwanted Marriage is an upcoming platformer game, developed by Squash Studios to celebrate the character's 30th anniversary.

name: Dear Pretentiousness
description: A train of thought twine game.

name: NieR Re[in]carnation: The People and the World
description: The People and the World is the third story arc of NieR Re[in]carnation, revolving around previously encountered memory characters within The Cage.

name: Adventurous Mind
description: Explore the depths of suspense, adventure, and intrigue with this bundle of must-have games: Alfred Hitchcock - Vertigo, Beyond a Steel Sky and Syberia 3. Immerse yourself in fascinating worlds, solve captivating mysteries and discover extraordinary stories.

name: Have Fun Together
description: The more the merrier! Gather friends and family for hilarious game nights with this bundle dedicated to party games.

name: Comic Book Legends
description: Discover the adventure and action bundle, bringing together three thrilling games: Blacksad: Under the Skin, North & South and XIII. Immerse yourself in unique universes and prepare for captivating and varied experiences.

name: Inky and the Alien Aquarium
description:
Inky and the Alien Aquarium is a brand new puzzle adventure game for the Game Boy Advance.
You play as Inky, a flapjack octopus, who has been abducted by aliens and put on display in their aquarium.

You will explore the alien mothership screen by screen, solving 50 puzzles to traverse the aquarium and bowels of the ship.

Along your journey, you will rescue sea creatures, and collect items to unlock more sections of the ship.

name: There Are Dinosaurs
description: In There Are Dinosaurs, you'll face the formidable challenges of resource management and dinosaur encounters. Construct and expand your underground refuge, strategically allocating rooms to meet the essential needs of your community, including food, water, power, and entertainment.

name: Neoclip
description: An arcade-like explorative experience about revealing unique De Stijl inspired compositions. Navigate a complicated labyrinth of evolving levels using the shadows of the walls to highlight the obscured regions.

name: labyrinth Trials
description: A game designed with the intend of speed running as the player you must fight monsters and robots and make your way through four stages and defeat all the bosses and make it to the end portal as quickly as possible

name: HeroTower
description: "Hero Tower" is a game without regular monsters where you directly face challenging bosses. Dodge the boss's attacks through rolling and jumping, and seize the opportunity to counter-attack. It tests players' reflexes, stamina management, and insight into the boss's moves.

name: TD Tower Defense
description: Build your towers according to the enmey you are facing in the wave. Upgrade your turrets to increase range, damage or rewards. Each enemy wave will be random and increases in speed and damage resistance. How far can you go!

name: Pawperty Damage: Free Character Skin Pack
description: 6 free character skins to change the look and vibes of Pawperty Damage's cast!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 5
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: TimeShifters: Expansion Pack 1
description: The first expansion to TimeShifters!

name: F1 Manager 2023: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
description: The F1 Manager 2023 Deluxe Upgrade Pack offers 12 unique challenges, including both starting grid and race moments, that will put even the most strategic Team Principal to the test.

name: Made in Hell
description: "Made in Hell" is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game. Throw bones and jump (warp). Throw a bone and keep climbing.

name: Tap the Road
description: Do you like a smell of petrol in the morning? So it’s your time to drop the hammer in this old school racing madness!

name: Bottle vs. Bullet
description: Fun bottle shooting game in 3d modes! Bottle vs Bullet is a fun physics bottles shooting game. You must shoot as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time. A very addicted shooter game is out now on the market! Your challenge is to shoot bottle and can as fast as you can. And for each 10 combos get shot, a little extra time will be added.

name: Tachyonest
description: Engage in a fast-paced, third-person spaceship shooter, where strategic combat meets explosive action in an interstellar battlefield.

name: Over Street: Traffic Racer
description: Over Street: Traffic Racer is the latest arcade racing game with ton of adrenaline. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards on each game mode.

name: Retro Speed Game
description: Feel the thrill of high speed racing in Retro Speed. It is an arcade racing game in which the speed of your car constantly increases as you keep collecting coins. Overtake as many cars as possible and emerge as the leader. Don't miss playing this highly addictive and fun game.

name: Time Bomb Race
description: Help Tiny Wheels and its friends to survive as long as they can. Imagine waking up with a bomb on their head and knowing only they have to run as fast as they can! Travel through many landscapes: from the nice calm country, to bumpy canyons, slippery icebergs and many more.

name: Pocket BMX
description:
Pocket BMX is a free-roaming 2D bike riding game that’s packed full of challenges that will see you pulling all kinds of air tricks and grinds with combos that will blow your mind.
Play through the story mode where all the BMX parks are in danger of being closed and its up to you to save the parks. With the help of your mentor the BMX Ninja, who will set various challenges for you throughout the levels, you will soon learn all the skills required to become an expert rider.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Marksman
description: For over 20 years, Big Buck Hunter has been a cultural icon as the world’s favorite hunting game. Millions of players have gotten hooked on the simple-to-play, hard-to-master game in their favorite bars, restaurants and arcades around the globe. Now, the legendary arcade franchise is introducing a sharp-shooting, competitive twist to the classic series and bringing the best-selling title to an exciting new place - your fingertips!

name: Up With A Fish!
description: Tilt your device to catch falling objects. Move the Fish up your stack by catching more fish bowls. How high can you score before you miss 3 fish bowls?

name: Magical Swirl
description: Welcome to this simple app. All you need is just 60 seconds. Tilt your device and your toy will move around. Collect stars to get points and increase the multiplier. Compete against your friends and time in this unique arcade app. Complete missions. Get rewards. Get cards and have fun.

name: SquirrelWarz
description: SquirrelWarz is a handcrafterd real time strategy mixed with casual game-play.

name: Risk Ranch
description: Welcome to the first and most exciting agriculture-based learning app for kids of all ages! Risk Ranch is a fun, free and fast-paced, single-player education game with engaging, real-life content, challenging you to learn about the economics of agriculture while bringing your steer to market. Avoid risks, allocate your coins wisely and purchase Futures to protect your investment… It’s up to you to safely raise your steer and make a profit on your farm! As you progress throughout the game, you’ll have a chance to play through all four seasons while learning about the real-time risks that affect the value of your steer.

name: Pachoink!
description:
Pachoink! The game boards provide the targets, but do you have the ball skills to take them all out?
Some levels require precision, others good timing, some brute force, but more often than not it's a combination of all of these. Rise to the challenge and earn your stars!

name: Happy Jogging in Hawaii
description:
Pound the streets and the beaches of Waikiki and surrounds in this jogging simulator which tells you how many calories you've burnt up. Also has a time attack mode for when you're feeling particularly fit and healthy.

The game features four game modes (Free mode ,3km, 6km & 12km) and different routes in each course that the player can choose during the course.

name: Shadows of Zana
description: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through the Sequel of Phantom of Zana. Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania and bring The Color back to Zana in this retro inspired 2D Action Platformer.

name: OMA: One Man Army
description: A hostile force has enslaved most of the human race! You are humanities last resort to put an end to the rampant force that is taking over the world! Do you have what it takes to destroy the enemy headquarters while navigating treacherous obstacles and fighting off dangerous enemies?

name: Color Splash: Cats
description: Color Splash: Cats is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable cats and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful cat paintings.

name: Amare Inversus
description: Amare Inversus is a psychological thriller about a surgeon deeply obsessed with her patient. Love, lust, and obsession will begin to blur, leaving the audience with an unforgettable visual novel.

name: Windstorm Double Pack
description: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship Discover the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she tries to befriend the black stallion called Windstorm.

name: Trapped in The Kanal
description:
I got locked in the keep-out area in a waterway
The quiet sound of water flow makes me uncomfortable
I need get out of here……

name: Music Man 2: New land
description: Sequel to Music man game. Collect all notes at 4 different levels to play piano and find also mysterious blue crystals

name: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily
description: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily is a turn-based stratergy game. The villainess Scarlet, deceived and falsely accused of killing of the King, becomes the first streamer. Through this, she uses manipulates and diversion to rebel against the vast military force of the Imperial Kingdom.

name: Hoshizora Tensei Another Sky
description: A free online card game playable in your browser.

name: To My Forever Love
description: 2D platformer in which you cannot walk. I wish you a fruitful journey.

name: Eto King
description: An online tower defense game using Japanese zodiacs to fight.

name: Monster Survivor
description: Monster Survivor is a free, fun survivor action game. Can you save the world by making the giraffe's neck longer?

name: Pizza King Fight
description:
Compete with your rivals to become the Pizza king!

It all started with a misunderstanding between the living pizzas...
Pizza and pizza collide in this rule-free battle!
...Is that what the battle to determine the best pizza is all about?

name: Quick Choice Girl
description: An educational running game combined with fun quizzes. How many can you answer?

name: Three Days to Chicago
description: One of them is visiting a friend in Chicago. The other wants to shake things up in New York City. It starts in San Francisco, but where this relationship goes is all up to you.

name: YaoGuai Hunter
description: Yao-Guai Hunter is a Wuxia roguelike deck-building game. In a world where Yao-Guai roam free, player battles with various evil beings, collecting cards and learn inner skills. Encountering various adventures in the martial world.

name: Clans Logue
description:
"Clans Rogue" is a game full of deck building where you fight with deck building while building deck.

Redevelop the previous Clans deck into a roguelike deck building game. While maintaining the real thrill of a single-player card game, we've improved the fun of adventuring in a fantasy world!
Recommended for those looking for a Slay the Spire-like card game and those who like Bord Game Dominion!

name: Lethal Crisis
description: Lethal Crisis is a bullet hell action game with cute anime girls!

name: Explore
description: An open world, soulslike action game with authentic battles with chibi characters.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 1 - Plus Edition
description: This popular visual novel has returned with additional content.

name: Mystery Lover
description: Wei who's in the supernatural club must solve the missing virtual idol incident with his girlfriend Bansha.

name: Popstars: Deine Chance
description: Sin descripción

name: The Marvelous Misadventures of Flapjack: Bottle Cap'n
description: Sin descripción

name: I'm on a Watcher Duty: Anniversary Special
description: The game to celebrate the Watcher Duty series.

name: Blood Hunting
description: Blood Hunting is a first-person survival horror game by Holcomb Entertainment LLC. A true survival horror experience that sets the stage on how dangerous revenge can be... if you can survive it.

name: Can Strike
description: Your employers at Fish Co are sending in Robots to end your strike! Use your union-granted weapons to destroy the waves of robots to keep the strike going.

name: Connected! 2
description: Minimalistic puzzle game. Connect the opposite sides of the same color by rotating the tiles. Each level is randomly generated, but guaranteed to be solvable!

name: Primal Rage
description: Game Boy port of Primal Rage.

name: Sel Mounta: Siege the Demon Castle
description: An RPG in which a party of 6 adventurers continue an ongoing quest to stop an invasion from a mysterious isolationist nation. Features JRPG style gameplay and a focus on story.

name: Jurassic Hopper: Crossy Dinos
description:
One part crossy style hopper.

One part Dinosaur survival game.

All Awesome.

name: I Must Eat Chili Oil
description:
I miss her mapo tofu.

436 words. Lumpy and greasy.

name: Climbing Over It with a Spear
description: Climb a mountain with a spear, if you fall, you get up.

name: Frog's Adventure
description:
Frog's Adventure is a point-and-click game about a frog who gets given a brain! Chase after a mischievous fairy, and get it to turn you into a regular frog again.

On your adventure, you'll meet many different animals who share the same fate... Can you lift the curse, and make everyone their true selves again?

name: Mystery Box: Escape The Room
description: Welcome to the 3rd chapter of the "Mystery Box" series. You're trapped inside dark rooms and must solve intriguing enigmas to open boxes and escape. Can you make it?

name: Witch's Heart: Shirarezaru Kako Majo Dorothy no Himitsu - Kanketsu-hen
description:
After "Witch's Heart: Bonus Stage", it is the third entry of the series by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment). This time, it focuses on one of the main protagonists and his conclusion: Sirius Gibson. It is an adventure game with horror themes made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, and contains simple action scenes.

Although published as a separate game, it is part of the main game.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
description:
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2's Nintendo 64 version was developed by Edge of Reality, who developed the Nintendo 64 port of the original Tony Hawk's Pro Skater.

The Nintendo 64 version includes all of the features from the PlayStation version plus an additional level however it lacks the FMVs featured on other versions as well as having some content censored such as the soundtrack.

name: Atmospheric Extinction
description:
Atmospheric Extinction is a Boom (-complevel 9) mapset comprised of 9 maps divided into 3 distinct and action-packed episodes.

This project began when I was messing around with OTEX and trying to see if I could come up with some interesting layouts with a sense of progression, interconnectivity, and be fun/rewarding to explore.

name: My Sacred Place
description: My Sacred Place is an action strategy RPG for the MSX in which you have to protect your village's garden from the clutches of the fearsome Garks.

name: The Walking Dead: Betrayal
description: Betray your friends in this 5-8 person game of cooperation and social deception set in the universe of The Walking Dead. Work together to survive, but trust no one! Traitors have so many ways to sabotage the team, the walkers are the most predictable threat.

name: The Ultimate Doom: In Name Only
description: The project was designed to be a creative exercise in building levels around the original map titles for all 36 maps of the Ultimate Doom with an increasing emphasis on creating challenging but enjoyable maps that will even given experienced veterans a stern test (Especially for an Ultimate Doom megawad and especially so for episodes 3 and 4). All maps are built to a limit removing (complevel 3) format and are beatable from a pistol start, difficulty setting are included, but some may need a little refinement to pitch the difficulty with more precision. Co-op starts are included but anything beyond this will be patchy and dependent on the author who made the map.

name: Marble Magicks
description: In this Game your goal is to place 3 marbles of the same color next to each other, by taking a marble from the top depot and letting them fall on the scales below.

name: Un Presagio de Huesos
description:
First part of Un Presagio de Huesos, where the promises of the old witch of the swamp are told and the Hero is presented with the ultimate temptation.

Play, O muse, the story of the futile hero; the story about the struggle against heaven and earth that cost the lives of countless orphans, brought a brother from the abysses of the confines to the borders of the Dream and made the rivers of the continent red.

name: Rust: Console Edition - New Cobalt Employee Welcome Pack
description:
Buy the New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack for Rust Console Edition.

Welcome to Cobalt. Our ‘New Cobalt Employee - Welcome Pack' has everything you need to start your new career with us. Out here on the frontier of science and technology, you'll need every advantage if you want to succeed. [Redacted]. Start your career with us in quintessential Cobalt style.

You will receive receive the following, Cobalt-themed items:
1500 Rust Coins
A customary rock skin
Standard-issue Cobalt jacket, trousers and shoes skins
Your very own Cobalt furnace skin
A cosy sleeping bag skin
A wooden door skin

name: MX vs. ATV Legends: KTM Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the KTM Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

KTM 125 SX MX
KTM 250 SX MX
KTM 250 SX-F MX
KTM 450 SX-F MX
KTM 250 SX ATV

name: Dawn of Marionette
description: An android suddenly comes to the player who was leading an ordinary life. A thrilling life with battles and adult activities.

name: Bouncers
description: Bouncers is a single player retro styled action game that has you avoiding enemies to climb the leaderboard. The bouncer will bounce around the screen in random directions and multiply over time, but more enemies for example the asteroid will appear.

name: Boxes
description: Welcome to Boxes, a nostalgic pixel art game that will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test! Embark on a delightful journey through over 100 mind-bending levels in this charming and addictive box-pushing adventure.

name: Heroes of Egypt: The Curse of Sethos - Collector's Edition
description: Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse. Your path will take you and your Egyptians through different landscapes. Defeat countless creatures and lose no time to lift the curse!

name: Borderlands 3: Designer's Cut
description: Borderlands 3 gets even bigger with the Director's Cut add-on content! Test your mettle against the most fearsome of all Varkids, scour the galaxy to solve a string of murders, experience never-before-seen content and insights from the creation of Borderlands 3, and earn rewards with three new Vault Cards featuring themed loot and powerful gear.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Living the Dream
description: What if fairy tales dreamed of real life? A visual novel adventure that explores the meaning of dreams and identity.

name: Dair
description: A platform fighting game with only one attack, this sequel to Nair focuses on edgeguarding and off-stage play.

name: Smashing
description: Destroy all the blocks to advance. More than 50 levels of brick-smashing fun! If the ball falls below the game area a pad is lost. Play Smashing game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 05
description:
When darkness falls, the shadows will rise.
Shadow Company and Task Force 141 face off in Season 05 of Call of Duty Warzone and MWII Which side will you choose?

Graves is alive.
Even if Task Force 141 successfully secured the warhead as part of their RAID, Farah lost her brother — and AQ asset — Hadir . . . but not before he revealed that a greater threat is on the horizon.
Unbeknownst to Price, Gaz, and the rest of 141, Farah and Alex head back into Urzikstan. A meeting has been set up with a former enemy who apparently wasn’t incinerated in his tank at the Fuerzas Especiales Headquarters in South America.
Three elite leaders pore over a map of Al Mazrah, where Graves has intel on a new ultranationalist threat now present in the AO, the same group Hadir could not speak of in his dying breaths:
The Konni Group.

name: The 4 Masters of Melody
description: The 4 Masters of Melody is a puzzle game for the MSX based on Simon.

name: Pokémon Pinball Generations
description: This is an expansion upon the original Pokémon Pinball, which adds a Johto experience.

name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
description:
The Nintendo Entertainment System version of the game is a simplified version that allows players to practice up to six laps or qualify for every Formula One race of the season using metric units (kilometres per hour instead of miles per hour). It was one of the few 8-bit Formula One video games to adequately represent the Circuit Gilles Villeneuve as having an urban background along with several other urban race tracks represented in the 1992 Formula One season. Tire wear is possible resulting in trips to the pit crew for maintenance and repairs. A radio allows communication with the crew chief; he will advise whether repairs are necessary. The top speed of the vehicle is 325 kilometres per hour and turbo is not used in the game.
Before the first qualifying session can take place, the player must insert his name and his nationality. The name can be up to 10 characters long and the country has to fit into a three-character field. Since the game doesn't verify if the three-letter code matches up to a real nationality, it doesn't matter if the player makes up a nationality for a fictional country.

name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
description: Game Boy port Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge.

name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshuu F-1 Hero MD
description: Sin descripción

name: Win The Game
description: You wake up on a remote island with a weapon and a message to "win the game." Fight for your life against your fellow students in this murder game inspired by Battle Royale & The Hunger Games

name: The 4 Masters of Melody Ex
description: The 4 Masters of Melody Ex is a remastered version of The 4 Masters of Melody, with improved graphics, a color palette optimized and switchable during gameplay for MSX2 or higher, title music, four background music options, joystick support, in-game hero animation, animated end story, cutscene, and the "Where Did I Go Wrong?" feature, which shows in case of game over which was the correct color to choose.

name: A Bite at Freddy's
description:
A Bite at Freddy's is a bite-sized Five Nights at Freddy's experience.

Freddy Fazbear's Grill needs your help to test and repair the Freddy Fast-Food Delivery machine! Work along the restaurant manager to ensure food orders can be delivered from kitchen to customer without issue.

Complete orders, repairs, and challenges!

name: Fredbear and Friends: Out of the Machine
description: Spend 5 nights as the night guard at Fredbear and Friends. Listen for the grandfather clock's chimes.

name: Five Nights With Mr. Hugs (& Friends)
description:
(WARNING : Super serious game about super serious self-aware vacuums)

Welcome to Freddy Fazbear's bakery! We mainly deliver to Fazbear restaurants, but we also will make cakes for personal parties! (For a proper fee, of course)

We are currently hiring for a janitor to vacuum the filth from this establishment, as our air system has broken down. Our self-aware vacuum cleaners have also turned evil and try to eat up anything in the building (including you), so defend yourself if they come nearby.

name: Roly Poly
description: Twist the world to roll our hero to the end of each crazy maze.

name: FeedBee and Friends: Left to Rock
description:
Warning: This teaser game is not for the faint of heart.

In this game, you must swiftly defeat FeedBee to save mankind, and of course your sanity.
This is no l
aughing matter, whatsoever.
At all.

name: A Night at Fanny's
description:
In a short parody of the first Five Nights at Freddy's game, you can spend a night with Fanny and friends!

Warning : This game is very difficult, you must listen for the movement patterns.

Fanny FanSteel's Fanaria will blow you away with their new fans, unlike those abominable Fazbear rinky-dinky desk fans. They name their fans "Animatronics", which is odd. We don't entirely understand.

Remember, the fan blades are metal. Watch your fingers. Hold your hats.

name: A Night at Fanny's 2
description:
In a short parody of Five Nights at Freddy's, you can spend a night with Fanny and friends! Again!

Welcome to Ferdinand's Fan Shop, where we have been designing all-new fans! While our alarm system is temporarily down, we need your help to make sure that no one steals the new models.

Remember, the fan blades are metal. Watch your fingers. Tuck your shirts.

name: Swords and Sandals I: Gladiator
description: Swords and Sandals Gladiator, are you ready to unleash hell in the arena?

name: Plumley's Trot
description: Plumley's Trot is a retro-style platformer about collecting cartons of plum juice. Its first iteration was made in 10 days for Retrograde Jam 4, intending to evoke the "GBC port of a MegaDrive game."

name: Ponyvania: Order of Equestria
description: Ponyvania: Order of Equestria is a fanmade 2D action-platformer based on the My Little Pony series and the Castlevania games.

name: Marshmello Music Dance
description: Marshmello Music Dance is a fun and addictive rhythm game based on Marshmello that will challenge your skills and keep you entertained for hours.
