name: Colors of Fate
description:
Within a peaceful village in the middle of a forest lived Melia, a cheerful and stubborn young girl; and her best friend Enris, who dreamed of becoming the village's next herbalist.

Both of them were happy without worry until an unfortunate incident separated the two children tragically.

Life is not always made of fairytales and tranquil days.

But come... and see Melia's fate unfold before your eyes, as she becomes a strong and independent young woman throughout the years!

name: Retro Rewind
description: Retro Rewind is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart Wii that adds in every retro track from the series, from Super Mario Kart to Mario Kart 8 with a few from Tour, into the game.

name: Alienated
description:
Alienated is a 10-level wad made for GZDoom and Zandronum. It features levels of varying size and difficulty, all made with the Ancient Aliens texture pack. There are 9 regular levels and one secret map, accessible from map06.

The wad is meant to be played with dynamic lights turned on. Freelook is recommended, but not required. No jumping or crouching. Do not use vanilla or software in the sector light mode settings, as these options can mess with certain tricks used in map08 and ruin the experience for you.

name: Skinship
description: Skinship is a large map for GZDoom with four new custom monsters, replacements for the cacodemon, imp, hellknight and baron of hell. They were all taken from realm667 and modified by me for balance's sake. Freelook is recommended. Dynamic lights should be turned on. Otherwise, important switches could be missed.

name: Perpetual Powers
description: Perpetual Powers is a 21-level megawad made for and tested with GZDoom and Zandronum. The wad is split into three distinct episodes, each containing 7 maps - usually short to medium sized ones, with a large one to end the episode. The project is co-op compatible.

name: Sliding Rails
description: Lead the TRAIN by sliding the rails. Get the STARs! This game is a sliding puzzle! Slide the rails and lead the train to the goal.

name: The Shrouded Parchments
description: Arise, lowly foreigner, and embark on an epic quest! Unravel the mysteries of this fantasy world, slay the monster that threatens to crumble it, and save it from its own destruction. Or, if you're feeling more ambitious, profit from its collapse.

name: TurtleQuest
description: TurtleQuest is a 2D-Platformer where you are sent on a quest to save your little turtle village from an unknown disease. You have to follow an ancient path through the old mountains, riddled with bewitched traps, to find the sacred plant Zingiber, which might help to cure all turtles.

name: Burn
description: The title, and the compo themes might provide clues. This is a puzzle.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 7
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 6
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Detective Barnett: The Cursed Artifact
description: Put your sleuthing skills to the ultimate test to solve a mystery like no other in this wild match-3 puzzle adventure!

name: Wizard Heist
description: The wizard isn't home. Can you steal his treasure and survive?

name: AceRace
description:
Did you ever wanted to feel the speed in a Soap-Box car, now with AceRace you can.
AceRace is a skill-based action racing game. Train your reflexes jumping over obstacles, crouching under dangerous trucks and avoiding parked cars.
Detailed graphics, adictive soundtrack, differents controls, special abilities...

name: Parking Swipe
description:
We have all been there – stuck in a parking jam at a parking lot and no matter how many times you go back and forth, you are still jammed! Don’t let that happen on your phone. With Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam, you have full control over the parking jam. Use your brain and logical thinking to decide how to unblock the parking lot. Figure out which car needs to move first and in which direction to unblock other cars.
With amazing 3D graphics and hundreds of parking jam levels, Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam will surely keep you entertained for hours. Even if you bump into a car or two while trying to ‘unjam’ the jam, that’s no reason for concern in this car parking game unless you are playing a challenge where every move counts. Literally.

name: Mack Attack
description:
It's not easy being a mackerel, all those pesky piranhas always want to eat you!
Steer away by wobbling your iPhone or iPad and try to survive as long as possible.
There's a surprise game mode for you if you can last for at least 80 seconds!
The Jelly fish may be annoying, but don't be to hard on them, do they even have brains? I don't know.

name: Wildwood Divas
description: Are you ready to take on the flying monsters? Step onto your plane, face an endless army of monsters, prove your strength, and win the most precious beauty pictures!

name: Lightracer Spark: Grey and Green
description: Lightracer Spark's first free DLC - Destinating to a tide-locked planet, choosing between Mechanical upgrade or Genetic modification, and finding the way out for the divided High-Skulled Ant civilizations.

name: Astro Flame: Starfighter
description:
Astro Flame Starfighter is a classic scrolling shooter with modern 3D graphics.
Upgrade the systems of your spaceship, upgrade your weapons and sweep away hordes of enemies on your way.

name: Snow Wars
description:
Step into the immersive world of Snow Wars. Gather your friends and prepare for thrilling snowball battles with up to 8 players, where skill and strategy will lead you to victory.

Snow Wars brings a refreshing twist to the shooting game genre by offering a casual yet engaging gameplay experience without any violence or bloodshed.

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Skull Noir Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Nerf Legends: Ultimate Nerf Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Cheerleader Costumes Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Primal Carnage: Evolution
description: Primal Carnage: Evolution builds on the bones of what came before, taking dinosaur versus human combat to the next level. Featuring an expanded roster of prehistoric playables, evolved gameplay, and a wealth of brand new content to sink your teeth into.

name: Tales of Arise: SAO Collaboration Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Motocross Driving Simulator
description: Get the real Motocross driving experience! Complete exciting missions, earn rewards and unlock new motorcycles.

name: Senile Wizards
description: Take the roll of a mighty wizard battling for honor and glory. Choose from dozens of crazy upgrades and smite your opponents

name: Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator
description: Choose your bike, conquer the town and mountains! Test your skills in Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator, packed with realistic graphics and exciting missions.

name: Racerloop
description: Racerloop is a zero-gravity arcade racing game based on the Outer Ring universe where you take on a new challenge to be the fastest in the universe. In Racerloop, you will be able to customize and upgrade your ships, trading and exchanging parts and vehicles in a blockchain-based economy and marketplace.

name: Lost Girl In Mirror
description: This is a girl puzzle adventure game, through the wisdom of the gentlemen's minds, through the complete patchwork scenes, to save the girls trapped in the mirror, to give them a place to live. More than a dozen different characters and scenarios for you to explore.

name: Gunner 3
description:
Gunner 3 is a very challenging 2d shooter, set in the forests of South America where rumours have been heard that in area 6B they are experimenting with mutants and weapons, your mission is to stop them and destroy all the soldiers enemies.
This game was developed by KNPMASTER in 2000, this is a remaster for modern systems. Created completely in the Unity Engine and with various improvements such as full screen (16: 9), improved HUD, more detailed clouds, new difficulty levels,...

name: Quest For The X
description: A retro, story-driven adventure set amidst the medieval intrigue of the Knights Templar.

name: Reel-istic Fishing
description: Hook, harpoon, and sell fish to venture deeper. What lies at the bottom?

name: To Dust
description:
To Dust is the second interactive sci-fi adventure comic set in the world of The Botanist.
In this volume the Botanist searches the spirit world for answers to the disappearance of a fellow scientist.
This is a linear story that takes approximately 15-20 minutes to complete.

name: Omoshiroi Moro
description: Mobile phone rhythm action game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Lucky Morolian
description: Mobile phone fortune telling game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Puzzle da Moro!
description: Mobile phone action puzzle game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Tapioka Panic
description: Mobile phone action puzzle game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Spebo
description: Mobile phone racing game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: My Kingdom for the Princess II
description: The official sequel to the addictive, award-winning strategy, time management, simulation game "My Kingdom for the Princess" It's the right time to prove yourself worthy of being a knight once again!

name: Hentai Abigail
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: The Creature Zone VR: Nightfall
description: Eddy Miles Is Sent On A Mission By The Creature Zone Department Of Science, Where He Will Travel Back To The Locations And Times Of 3 Infamous Incidents, The First Terry's Pizzeria Murder, The Extraterrestrial Massacre On Camp Clearwater, And The Death Of A Kid In The Vents Of Terry's Pizzeria.

name: 8Floor Bundle 4 in 1
description:
This pack includes:
Garden City
Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen
Gnomes Garden 5: Halloween
Gnomes Garden 7: Christmas Story

name: GalaX
description: A doujin shoot-em-up by MasaHG.

name: Melvor Idle: Atlas of Discovery
description: Atlas of Discovery, Melvor Idle’s second expansion, is all about exploration! Discover eight new Combat Areas packed with dozens of monsters to fight and hundreds of new items to find. Unlock two new exploration skills, try the all-new Ancient Relics Gamemode… and more!

name: Luigi's Other Mansion
description: Luigi's Other Mansion is a modification of Luigi's Mansion that shuffles around the entire mansion with different ghost layouts, item locations, room orders, and even includes several difficulty changes that are seen in the 3DS remake version of the Hidden Mansion.

name: Stairs of Basically
description: An entirely new narrative experience from Davey Wreden (The Stanley Parable) and Ryan Roth (Starseed Pilgrim, The Yawhg).

name: Truco!
description: After losing his soul in a card game gamble, a boy must recover it by traveling around the Underworld! Face strange creatures and the Devil itself in this RPG with a battle system based on a popular card game in Brazil, the Truco! Cheat your way through the challenges you will face and take your Soul back, but remember, the enemies can do the same with you!

name: Ataxia
description: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Truco!: Chapter 1
description: Truco!: Chapter 1 is the first chapter of the game Truco!

name: Submachine Extended Version
description: In this extended version there are twice as many rooms to explore and twice the fun. Solve the new puzzle and see the altered ending.take a sneak preview of the Submachine 2 before its even finished.

name: OwnRulesRPG
description:
"OwnRules RPG" is an immersive open-world role-playing game that allows you to slip into the role of a fictional character.
The game offers a variety of features that allow you to fully customize your character, from choosing their appearance to their clothing and vehicles.

name: D-Virus: Evil Menance
description:
D-Virus: Evil Menance is a short RPG made with RPG Maker MV to participate in the Major Jam, whose theme was Cosmic.

Playing as Melissa Casanova, you must use the power of your HERZ to fight against a deadly virus that spread through the Wittelsbach spaceship. The HERZ is the only way to fight these demons!

name: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition
description: D-Virus: Devilnitive Edition is an update for D-Virus: Evil Menance that completely improves the game and adds new content.

name: ZodiaX
description: ZodiaX is a turn-based roguelike where you, as one of the twelve zodiacs, have to un-corrupt your siblings and stop this malevolent being!

name: Minecraft: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description:
Cowabunga! The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have found their way into Minecraft in this radical DLC. Play as any of the four Turtles to take down gnarly enemies, save New York from Shredder, and eat all the pizza!
Includes official TMNT skins (based on the original '87 Turtles and the new Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mutant Mayhem movie).

name: Ultimate Chump
description: In this action packed rouge lite, you find yourself as the chump that's got to survive and eliminate swarms of horrors. Mix and match your loadout, then select various upgrades and augments as you fight to setup numerous possible builds through each playthrough.

name: The King in the Shades
description: A classic survival-horror experience set in a fictional universe where the invisible hand of unspeakable horrors is turning humanity into a fleeting memory. Enter the world of The King in the Shades and rid this decaying world of the curse of Gods.

name: Soul Devourer
description: Soul Devourer is a metroidvania action-platformer with a classic 2D horror style. You'll explore the vast, cursed Sakuradoki High School, master unique abilities, fight twisted monsters and uncover the long-buried secrets concealed under the school.

name: SexWife: No Limit
description: No limit is adult visual novel with puzzle elements. Follow your hidden desires with sexy hot wife cheating on her husband.

name: Party Party Time: Happy Happy Pack
description: Guaranteed to further boost your joy! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Happy Happy Pack, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Gather everyone and party happy, party on!

name: Castle Push
description: Castle Push is a fantasy and strategy game developed by Blue Cat Studio. Play the classic browser strategy. Complete all levels and unlock all possible achievements in this game. And listen to the best music from Haindale.

name: Chaotic Pursuit
description: Chaotic Pursuit is a hardcore Top-Down Shooter with cute graphics. You miss a shot and you're out!

name: Dragabox
description: Use your intellect to clear a pathway to the door. Push and pull boxes out of your way, and deactivate electrical barriers. Over 200 levels of brain-busting challenges. Give it a try. See if you can complete them all!

name: FightBots
description: You are a professional robot-athlete of FightBots, the most popular sport on the planet in 2125. Would you be able to be champion of the FightBots league?

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator
description: Survive a monstrous weekend in Transylvania using your sharpest weapon: humor. Gloaming Comedian Simulator combines Casual, Arcade, and Visual Novel genres in a hilarious adventure filled with frights and laughs. Get ready to steal the show in this ghoulishly gag-filled game!

name: Coloring Pixels: Magic Pack
description: This Magic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Spells, tricks and wonders of the imagination! Grab your wand and cape and get ready to perform spectacles out of this world!

name: Bingaboll
description: You are a basketball that handles gravity and your job is to get into the hoop before the bells ring, you have 24 seconds to overcome the obstacles and get in

name: Blue Dragon: Shuffle Dungeon
description: Shuffle Dungeon has arrived! This new content features a mysterious dungeon that changes every time you enter. Along with more than 30 new items, powerful monsters, and more than 10 new hard-to-beat bosses, there are certainly some challenges in store for you! Are you up for it? (Recommended Starting Level: 50 or higher. Supports Hard and Impossible game modes.) Note that you will need to be near the end of the game, and have saved that game, in order to enter a Warp Cube to Shuffle Dungeon.…

name: Kemco: 50 RPGs Celebratory Bundle
description: Introducing the ultimate RPG bundle in celebration of the 50th title released on Xbox now made available for a limited time featuring 50 full-fledged RPGs!

name: Taimanin Asagi
description: Asagi was the strongest Taimanin in Tokyo, but after completing her last mission, she just wants to settle down and marry her lover Kyousuke. Her old nemesis has other plans, however, and creeps back from the dead to seek vengeance...

name: Genshin Impact: As Light Rain Falls Without Reason
description:
The third major update (Version 4.0) of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Lyney, Lynette and Freminet
• New region, Fontaine, with new areas: Belleau Region, Beryl Region and Court of Fontaine Region
• New gameplay mechanics: Underwater Exploration
• New combat mechanics: Arkhe (Ousia and Pneuma energy)
• New main story quests: Chapter IV, Acts I & II
• New story quest for Lyney
• New main event: Mega Meka Melee
• …and more!

name: Fire Emblem 8: Self-Randomizing
description:
Romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones by circleseverywhere.

Randomization options:

Tactician name as seed value
Random classes for players and enemies
Random Growths (& Bases)
Random Personal Skills
Random Weapon Stats
Random Chest and Event Items
Palettes That Might Be Janky Because That’s Part Of The Charm

name: F1 Pole Position
description: Sin descripción

name: Daba: Land of Water Scar
description: Daba: Land of Water Scar is a new title from Dark Star. It tells the story of a humanoid clay puppet. When the world is on the verge of collapse, the puppet traces the whereabouts of the water fragments within the ancient city, and throughout their journey of defeating enemies and seeking answers, unravels the story of the world and oneself. The game features various landscapes including abandoned ruins, a magnificent ancient city, gloomy prison, vast rift valley, expansive snowfield, deadly forest, and a floating city. Non-linear levels are interconnected, distinct, and intricate.

name: Nakajima Satoru: F-1 Hero GB '92 - The Graded Driver
description: Sin descripción

name: Exiledge
description: The universe trembles, the soil shatters. A young man called Alter embarks on the adventure to uncover the destiny of the world built by Zora. In Exiledge, experience a unique combat system on the base of third-person shooter with hack and slash. Fight along with the mysterious girl, Zora, and experience colorful battles and epic boss fights. Search for the truth of the universe and the opportunity to save the world in an eternal cycle.

name: The God Slayer
description: The God Slayer is an open-world action RPG featuring a highly immersive gameplay system and story experience, allowing players to enhance their abilities through battles and world exploration with the ultimate goal of defeating enemies and saving the world.

name: The Winds Rising
description: The Winds Rising is a story-driven action RPG developed by TiGames. It follows the journey of a girl from a peaceful village who embarks on a grand adventure after she encounters a lost monster cub, which affects the rise and fall of the entire kingdom. Her fate is in the player’s hands. Players can look forward to a refreshing and smooth combat experience, immersive and captivating story, and a world of ever-changing adventure.

name: NBA Jam Tournament Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA Jam Tournament Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA Jam
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA Jam
description: A port of the classic basketball arcade game for the Game Gear. Due to technical limitations, the graphics are of lower quality in this version.

name: Submachine 2: The Lighthouse
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Kakutou Bijin Wulong
description: Kakutou Bijin Wulong (Fighting Beauty Wulong) is an action fighting game based on the manga and anime series created by Yugo Ishikawa and TMS Entertainment. The single-player story follows the plot of the anime unchanged, giving the player a chance to take part in many of the fights from the original series. The game itself is a full-3D beat-'em-up style brawler, and the goal of each stage is to simply defeat every enemy. Ran has a wide variety of different fighting techniques available to her, and can even switch between several different fighting styles on the fly. Items can also be collected that will let the player use extra-damaging special moves. In addition to the main story mode, there is also a two-player versus mode.

name: Scramble Star Crossing
description: Embark on a stellar action-puzzle adventure! Engage in local multiplayer battles with 2-4 players. Hone your skills as a Star Clearer in our many single-player modes, clearing colorful stars in the night sky. Or unravel the mysteries of the world and its inhabitants with a huge cast of characters!

name: Village Life: Love, Marriage and Babies
description: Start your family today!

name: Cut the Rope Daily
description:
Solve one new logic puzzle every day to keep your streak alive. Cut ropes and pop balloons to feed cute green monster Om Nom, who's craving a candy fix!
Take part in a global challenge to solve one physics-based puzzle every day: one level, one world, daily. Challenge your friends, compete and compare your puzzle mastery!
Om Nom, the world's cutest monster, returns with a renewed craving for candy and a new challenge for the whole Netflix community! Enjoy the famous physics-based gameplay that is just as fresh and satisfying as you remember it — but with an unexpected twist:

name: Animal Shelter: Vet Clinic
description: Expand your pet care experience and become a true hero for your furry friends in Vet Clinic DLC by opening your own animal veterinary clinic! 🥼

name: Toy Craft
description:
Players begin the game with a single crafting ingredient and a crafting container.
From there, things quickly progress, allowing players to use more ingredients and containers, craft more advanced toys, and bring more happiness to the world!

name: Monster Legends: Collect Them!
description:
Breed and train monsters of all elements and rarities! Build your fighting force and face the ultimate challenge: Battles against other Monster Masters!
Discover the universe of Monster Legends and the story of its inhabitants. Start by building a city for your monsters, fill it with habitats, and breed new species! Then, collect monsters and choose your strategy in action-packed battles.

name: Molekular: Puzzle Adventure
description:
Start playing Molekular: Puzzle Adventure - loved by thousands of players around the world. Use atoms to form molecules. Don't worry! You don't need to be a chemistry-guru to play! Play levels to learn interesting facts about chemical compounds and become a true scientist!
Just swipe up, down, left or right to move the highlighted atom and bond it with the other ones on the board. Find out new compounds and get interesting facts about them.
Try to complete over 140 levels to become a true scientist!
Molekular: Puzzle Adventure is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
You can play on the device you prefer (iPhone, iPad it's the same!), the game will always be up-to-date thanks to its cloud functions.

name: Absolute Dishonor
description: Absolute Dishonor is a brand-new 8-level WAD created between Michael Jan "valkiriforce" Krizik and Jon "40oz" Vail - four maps from each map author. The levels are inspired from old-school Doom WADs from the 90's such as Memento Mori and The Plutonia Experiment.

name: Vaporware
description:
Vaporware is a collaborative project for the Eternity Engine, created by a loosely-organized group of friends from various corners of the Doom community. We like making maps, we were aware of Eternity’s capabilities, and we decided it’d be fun to create some maps that made use of those capabilities. We organized a little project amongst a few of ourselves, and over time it evolved into this.

Vaporware also includes a large quantity of new resources, including textures, monsters, weapons, ambient sounds, and an original ogg-format soundtrack composed by Julian Hope and Esselfortium.

name: Doom Redemption
description:
A 'tribute' to Doom 1. All the styles of episodes 1, 2, 3 (and even 4) squished into a 9 map episode.

This wad doesn't use any ZDoom features that are not seen in the original doom, except for HUD messages at the start of each level, and of course the features that come with Hexen format maps.

name: Secret of Mana Turbo
description: Secret of Mana Turbo is a compilation of independent mods aimed at streamlining and accelerating the tried and true gameplay of Secret of Mana. Some of the main features include a streamlined weapon change menu and the removal of stamina, making a stream of consecutive attacks possible.

name: The Night Watch: Ranger Survival
description: The Night Watch : Ranger Survival is a tiny top-down shooting game where you must survive through the night with ranger's oldest friends - bow, arrow, and a bonfire. Shoot down monsters marching out from darkness, keep your bonfire and yourself safe, and survive to see the next sun rises.

name: Mr. Amo
description: A Pseudo Dungeon RPG Game.

name: Sexual Super Hero
description: Live the life of a super hero who must romance the queens and princesses of a parallel world to save his own world.

name: Friendly Lab: Unlock
description:
Welcome, researcher. You will soon be conducting a gentle experiment on our two subjects. The experiment is a safe, secure and gentle one, involving no force, commands or torture.

A small, locked room with a clock. Two subjects with missing memories. A researcher. You. The final result will depend on you.

name: Scary Siam Mall
description: Scary Siam Mall is a horror game in Tha Song Mueang Plaza shopping mall. atmosphere and scary.

name: Shooter
description: Shoot, dodge, and jump your way through adversaries in this action packed adventure!

name: Disparity of the Dead
description: Disparity of the Dead was originally created back in October of 2020 for the Dread X Collection 3. It is a 3d platformer / detective game hybrid in which you try to solve the mystery as to why people are dying and not showing up in the afterlife.

name: Nexus
description: Nexus is a third person MOBA play-to-earn shooter. Craft a wide variety of weapons, abilities and equipment to build your own custom character. Defend your NEXUS at all costs and ruthlessly destroy your enemies in fast paced 5v5 MOBA action built on Unreal Engine 5. Equip abilities in your loadout and swap between them to adapt to your opponents and your team’s needs. This is a tournament game which will have ZERO pay-to-win elements.

name: Arcadia: Colony
description: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Transplatform
description: A rough AS3 platform game.

name: Collision Paradise
description: Hey, darling! Get ready for some adorable monster-smashing action with your balls! Oh no, there are so many of them! Help, save me! But don't worry, sweetheart, you've got this! Smash those monsters, unlock the most stunning CG rewards, and let's have a blast together! You're my hero!

name: Super Mario Ultimate
description: This is a full hack of Super Mario Bros 3 from NES. It features 8 new worlds, over 90 new levels, new graphics, new enemies, save game, difficult selection, item slot, etc.

name: Steampunk Runner
description: Summer. In a flying city that lacks grass, water, and clean air, the most sought-after and dangerous profession is guarding and patrolling the borders. Everyone wants the boy to be in the best set, and our hero didn't rule it out.

name: Blue Mario Bros. 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Asgard's Fall
description: Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Arena-Shooter-Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?

name: TaliVan
description: Gear up for an adrenaline-fueled adventure in a mesmerizing fictional desert like no other! Take control of an awe-inspiring super car in this exhilarating car game and buckle up for an exhilarating journey through treacherous terrains.

name: Car Factory
description: Start your own Car Factory. Build different Cars, Upgrade Stations and Cars, Expand your Factory.

name: Quaint
description: Quentin “Q” Hawthorne is a coffee-loving IT specialist living a quiet life in the small town of Millbrook. But he’s about to learn that this charming place holds a secret – it is home to a 200-years old mage association known as the Snake and Saber Society. Invited to join their ranks, he’ll now have to redefine his understanding of the world. But each step he takes on this new promising path will also bring him closer to his troubled past. Will he be able to confront it? Or will the shackles of guilt stop him from ever moving on?

name: Angelique: A Grief Encounter
description: A text-only adventure. As Angelique, your task is to survive trials, and tribulations, to meet up with Arnold.

name: Downtown Drift
description: Where you can experience a fun drifting game unblocked called Downtown Drift, which provides an adrenaline-pumping racing game. Join a game of car racing through the city, in which you must drive your car at a high rate of speed along an express highway. Downtown Drift is a game of car racing through the city. You'll be going three vehicles and attempting to win every race. If you want to complete a track, you must win each challenge in a row. You must finish each race in first place to advance to the next race and earn points for your efforts.

name: Super Mario Omega
description: This hack is the result of two and a half years of hard work. Join Mario as he travels through over seven unique worlds on his quest to rescue Princess Peach.

name: Mario's Trip in China
description: A romhack for Super Mario 64 with 147 stars, where Mario travels to many places in China. This was developed by two people, Liuzijun and mariofan104.

name: Slask's Adventure
description: A 152-star kaizo romhack of Super Mario 64 with an easier version available. This was developed by two Chinese modders,Slask and Liuzijun.

name: Sims 4 Multiplayer
description: The Sims 4 Multiplayer is a mod for The Sims 4 that allows you to play the game with up to 12 friends in real-time multiplayer!

name: Femdemic
description:
Lead an alien bacterial race that induces male to female body transformations, one cell at a time. But as the new women embrace their bodies, the politicians close in… Femdemic is a witty, trans-affirming idle clicker with two story paths that explore gender, happiness, and femininity:

Liberation is a wholesome, trans-affirming story for the LGBTQIA2+-Audience.. Lead a benevolent mission to give each trans woman the body she needs. Increasing your hosts’ self-love is crucial to success. But beware politicians as they attempt to lock down this trans awakening …

Compliance is a feminization-fetish story for kinkster players. Your alien bacterial race spreads to new hosts through sex, but there’s a catch - All natural-born Earth women are immune. The solution: Transform infected males into new females! Change each male host into a sexy female one - then encourage them to mate and spread the infection. Operation Feminize Earth has begun.

name: LZJ's Galaxy Trip
description: A romhack of Super Mario 64 about going to space. It is Liuzujin's third hack.

name: Super Luigi 64: The Flower Cup
description:
This is a 166-star romhack of Super Mario 64 about a visit to a small town, where Luigi finds himself the main rogue in a murder! He must follow the shadow to a strange fortress, one he recognizes vaguely. Through the various paintings created in front of him, Luigi must escape the fortress to solve the mystery, catch the culprit, and?

This is the sequel/remake to Luigi & The Violet Stars. This does not invalidate Violet Stars at all.

name: Star Revenge 8: Scepter of Hope
description: A 121-star romhack of Super Mario 64 and the last in the Star Revenge series of hacks

name: Submachine 3: the Loop
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Royal Flush: Princess Sidestory
description: A short romhack of SMB3 where you play as Peach

name: Pro Tennis Tour
description: Pro Tennis Tour ranks you 64th amongst the best tennis players in the world.

name: Submachine: Ancient Adventure
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Ballistic Showdown
description: Prepare for an epic ball arena battle in Ballistic Showdown! master powerful moves, and compete against players from around the world. Get ready to dodge, shoot, and score your way to victory in this ultimate ball game. Play now and become the ultimate champion!

name: Submachine 4: The Lab
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Space Invaders
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Invaders
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman 20XX: Tatakae! Team Shachi
description: Maga Man joins forces with Team Shachi on their new song “Rocket Queen feat. MCU”! Control Team Shachi to stop the brainwashed Maga Man controlled by Dr. Wily and save the world!

name: Doom
description: 32X port of Doom. It has less content than the original version. It is based on the Atari Jaguar port.

name: New Leaf
description:
A man alone in the woods, all he wanted was peace, but he caught attention of a deadly creature.

Will you survive to see the reason behind all the chaos or be swallowed by the thing manipulating the entire forest?

name: Doom
description: The GBA port of Doom has some of the original levels missing, but has Link Cable support. The engine is based on the Atari Jaguar port, being the last version with this engine.

name: Doom
description:
The Jaguar version of Doom was published by Atari and was developed by id Software. It was released on November 28, 1994.

Like the PC version, this version of Doom was developed on the NEXTSTEP platform, and compiled to run on the Jaguar. The bulk of the engine was programmed by John Carmack, while Dave Taylor handled the multiplayer code.

This version was the first official port of Doom to begin its development cycle, although the 32X version was released first. The 32X, 3DO, GBA and PlayStation ports are all derived from this port.

name: Doom
description: Doom for the Saturn is a port of the PlayStation port of Doom (which has content from Ultimate Doom and Doom II), but uses the same engine as the 32X port.

name: Doom
description: The 3DO version of Doom was very compromised because of its development cycle. It was based on the previous Atari Jaguar port.

name: Endgame of Devil
description: As the Devil, command your minions to defeat the greedy adventurers! Explore over a hundred unique followers, sixty diverse monsters, and discover various battle strategies. Enjoy the convenience of one-click auto battles!

name: Goblin Creed: Origins
description: The kingdom is in danger. You must communicate this to your master!

name: Immortal
description: "Immortal"is a game that simulates the operation of a cultivation sect. Players can hire cultivators to explore secret realms, cultivate spiritual plants, or refine pills and magic treasures, ultimately enhancing the sect's reputation and becoming the first sect in the cultivation world.

name: Se/\/Se
description: Se/\/Se is a strategy, maze, horror game where you use your five senses to escape a mansion full of monsters. The senses you cherish most are ripped from you one by one and you must now survive without it. Make it through all five levels to escape. Will you navigate your way through the danger?

name: Sex Simulator: Yoga Girls
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a sexy instructor who helps her clients achieve deeper orgasms through the practice of yoga.

name: Rageblocks
description: "Rageblocks" - Block Stapling Redefined! Unleash Sidescrolling Powerdowns, create 8x8 Mega Chunks and multiply your score! An electrifying puzzle revolution awaits!

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Book of Nature
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Only Up: With Friends
description: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...

name: Ogo
description: Ogo is an arcade twin-stick shooter where you control yin and yang to defeat your enemies, complete varied levels or just relax in different endless game modes.

name: Mystery Box: Evolution
description: Enjoy the 3rd chapter of the 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! Unlock 57 boxes by solving tons of intriguing riddles that will put your brain to work

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Prehistoric Marine Species Pack
description: Plunge into the ancient depths and discover four new marine species with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Prehistoric Marine Species Pack.

name: Gray Destiny
description: An indie precision platformer that offers an atmospheric and captivating experience. Take control of the young boy as he navigates through a series of meticulously crafted levels. The game's visuals blend terrifying traps with dark environments, immersing players in an exciting adventure.

name: Grasshoppers!
description: In this simple but challenging arcade game, help Bobby pick up some pumpkins as fast as you can...but watch out for the Grasshoppers!

name: Deathwave Aftermath
description: Deathwave Aftermath is an open world post-apocalyptic turn-based strategy game inspired by classic games like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger but with a higher focus on giving you control over how your character is built.

name: American Truck Simulator: W900 Tuning Pack
description: The W900 Tuning Pack features over 500 individual tuning parts, of which most are aftermarket, for both the interior and exterior of the truck cab, giving you a massive range of options to personalize your Kenworth W900 just the way you like it.

name: All Mighty Tower
description: Build the highest tower in the world. Place the block the right time to not to lose any length of the block.

name: Zoo Leap
description: Jump from one platform to another to get further. Collect coins to buy new characters.

name: Item Tower
description: "Item Tower" is a unique game that turns the mundane into an exciting challenge. Players build towers by expertly arranging a variety of everyday items - from chairs and bananas to microwaves, washing machines, and statues. The challenge lies in balancing these unpredictable pieces. Stacking up 10 items gives your tower stability, but watch out! Any less and your tower could come crashing down. Stack up 50 items and watch your tower magically disappear, leaving behind your well-earned points. Competition escalates with an online leaderboard, as players from around the world vie to amass the most points in this whimsical, strategic game. Step into "Item Tower" and elevate ordinary objects into extraordinary adventures!

name: Arcade Archives: Baraduke 2
description:
"Baraduke 2" is an action shooter released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
The crablike "Octy" were not fully eliminated from their fortress in the previous title, "Baraduke".
Rely on help from the Paccet you rescued in the last game as you complete your mission to finish off the vicious Octy extraterrestrials!

name: The Voices Stories
description: A collection of 5 short stories written by Matthew Green about 20 years ago

name: Try to Fit
description: Sin descripción

name: Jimbaori: The Onin War
description:
Set in feudal Japan during the late 16th century, the story follows the rise and fall of Hideyoshi, a man consumed by his hunger for power and the tragic consequences that ensue.

As Hideyoshi's life nears its end, his insatiable thirst for power and the consequences of his actions culminate in a dramatic clash between nations.

Driven to expand his influence and secure his legacy, Hideyoshi embarks on a campaign that will test his military prowess and, ultimately, seal his fate.

As the invasion unfolds, Hideyoshi faces unexpected resistance from the Korean forces led by the renowned Admiral Yi Sun-sin.

name: Ducky Bouncy
description: Embark on an exciting journey in a bubble to get to help a duckling you found who has lost its familly.

name: Zombie Racers
description: Take on the best Zombie Racers in this automotive zombie bloodfest.

name: KatataK
description: Spearhead the resistance and fight your way across a war-torn London in story mode; Team up with awesome mercenaries to save the world! Battle an endless horde of interstellar kitties in survival mode to unlock new weapons and playable characters.

name: Stack Buddies
description: Lucco and his buddies love to stack! And it's easy to see why. Stack Buddies is an enjoyable game in which you drop bricks while trying to make the biggest tower that you can.

name: My Cat Club: Collect Kittens
description: Collect adorable cats and take cute photos of them in this relaxing cat collection game. Decorate your apartment in your favorite style to make the perfect cozy home for your cats, then take pictures to share on the in-game social media page and watch your follower count rise! A simple game that is perfect for relaxing - start your own cat club now!

name: Mighty Match Puzzle Adventure
description:
You are Chouchou, heir of the Sacred Rooster Dynasty. Your quest is to travel across the Holy Mountain and free the Sacred Animals from the dark spell cast upon them by the mysterious Evil Master. To achieve your goal, you will have to gain experience and unlock the best weapons, by finishing as many objectives as possible.
But victory won’t come so easily! You will need courage and dexterity to align resources on your path, granting you more strength, defense and magic.

name: Kepler Attack
description: Kepler Attack is an arcade game for your iPhone and Apple Watch. Fly through space and destroy waves of alien space invaders from Kepler-452b.

name: Kids Puzzle Animal Game
description: Explore the animal kingdom with Joey the Kangaroo through the shark aquarium, across the plains of Africa, and deep into Jazz Panda's musical jungle as you complete magical puzzles and explore animated landscapes!

name: Bad Student Driver: Swing Ride
description:
Are you the best worst student driver? Can you earn your license? The Bad Student Driver returns with Swing Ride!
Drive your car as far as you can down the road, avoiding the traffic cones, wild animals, and the curb as you veer to the right, then to the left, and back again. Does your car badly need a front-end alignment, or are you just that bad of a driver? We're not sure, but the results are hilarious!

name: Hungry Froo
description:
Use the simple touch controls to launch moon rocks into the trees! Drop all the delicious fruit to the ground for Froo to eat.
Be sure to aim carefully. Froo doesn’t want any of the rotten fruit and there are many challenging obstacles to avoid and puzzles to solve.

name: DogHotel
description:
DogHotel invites you to manage a brand new dog resort, put your dog sitting skills to the test and learn how to run a successful doggy hotel business.
Look after all the doggies placed in your care.
Granny Edith's pug needs to lose some weight, beefy Lucky the Labrador wants to join the fire department and little Lizzy the Poodle wants to learn her first tricks. Make sure all the dogs have a nice time in your hotel and that they return to their owners happy.

name: Car Salon Kingdom
description:
Overhaul your customers’ rides and turn their junkers into high-speed supercars! Do you have what it takes to run a top-of-the-line auto repair shop?
A day in the life of an auto mechanic is brimming with troubles and problems to fix; but with Wrench and the gang, it’s all about giving their customers a sweet ride. Help Wrench, Flat, Ratchet, Pliers, Socket, Lube, Torque, and Hammer keep their customers satisfied and build a business empire that will offer the best car service in town!

name: Half-Life: MMod - USS Darkstar
description: The USS Darkstar mod changed to run under Half-Life: MMod.

name: Half-Life: MMod - Uplink
description: The Uplink mod changed to run under Half-Life: MMod.

name: Only Up 64
description: Only Up 64 is a level mod for Super Mario 64 inspired by the game Only Up. The level is currently the biggest level mod for Super Mario 64.

name: Doom
description: The Super Nintendo version of Doom was published by Williams Entertainment on September 1, 1995, near the end of the system's life cycle. This is the first SNES title rated M for mature, and one of only three rated as such (the others being Mortal Kombat 3 and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3, coincidentally also published by Williams Entertainment, Inc.). The cartridge features a Super FX 2 chip, and Doom was one of few SNES games to feature a colored cartridge; the NTSC release was available in a red casing. The game does not use the Doom engine, but features a custom engine, known as the Reality engine, programmed by Randy Linden.

name: Submachine: FLF
description:
This is the game about memories, how they fade away, trick us or straight up lie to us.

Do you remember this game? Are you sure?

Try this version – you might not recognize it. Did you really hear this music? Is it changed? Or maybe it was there all along… I don’t remember anymore. One thing I know for sure – those pictures… I recognize them, they’re… from my past, my ancestors. I’ve seen them so many times, but were they here before? Is it possible that somebody changed them? Did I change them?

There’s a machine I haven’t seen before. There’s a room I haven’t been to, but I could swear I did. My memory about this game is murky. That’s how I see this game now. That’s the one I did so many years ago. Or is it?…

name: Nick Racing Stars
description: Ladies and gentlemen start your engines and get ready to race around the tracks with some of your favorite Nickelodeon characters.

name: Block Party
description: Meet your most favorite Nickelodeon characters in this wonderful game! You must help them to perform different actions and go through big playing fields throwing dices and solving different puzzles. Good luck!

name: Nick Racers Revolution 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: My First Craft Survival
description: When I woke up, I found myself on an uninhabited island. And I had nothing with me! Anyway, the first priority is to find food to avoid starvation. At night, mysterious creatures attack, so I need to craft equipment and build a base to defend myself! In the end, there's a boss waiting for me!

name: Blooming
description: Blooming, is a 2D platformer action game. Use your bow, which can be turn into dual blades, to defeat your foes and explorer different areas in any order you want. Defeat bosses in order to absorb their power and get new abilities.

name: Mushi no Idokoro
description: Mushi no Idokoro is a puzzle game about insects in a fantasy world.

name: Nethernovel
description: Fully remastered for 2018, experience the critically acclaimed game that has delighted audiences for generations.

name: Your Call
description: A short visual novel about making an important call.

name: 403 Puppet
description: He's not a puppet, he's a real boy!

name: Click Manga: Dynamic Robot Taisen 1 - Shutsugeki! Kyoui Robot no Gundan!!
description:
An interactive comic based on popular Japanese Super Robot manga series & characters.
The gameplay is that you have to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene.

name: Click Manga: Dynamic Robot Taisen 2 - Kyoufu! Akuma Zoku Fukkatsu
description: Click Manga: Dynamic Robot Taisen 2: Kyoufu! Akuma Zoku Fukkatsu is an interactive manga for PlayStation based on the major characters created by Go Nagai and Dynamic Productions. It was published by Tokuma Publishing Co. on December 16, 1999.

name: Hexlords: Quantum Warfare
description:
This was a world made out from the best intentions. The year is 2020 and tensions have reached critical mass between the four major factions of the world - The United, The Guards, Modernists, and Zealots. Having enjoyed peace and world-wide social and economic freedom since the end of World War II, the United Democratic Government has finally collapsed due to increasing pressure from radicals to reintroduce borders and independence between countries. This has given rise to underground warlords wishing to take advantage of this situation be it from a moral standpoint or for pure profit.

Do you believe in absolute independence like the Zealots or do you trust in the powers of a United government? Choose a side or play the field to build the ultimate force.

name: JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic
description: JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic invites the player to explore the secrets of the museum and to escape the grovelling fiend. dodge, press and explore the mysterious facility to find what is lurking within.

name: Uanamon: Rugly Invasion
description: In the basement during the shelling, Sofia creates a character named Dracolyk who protects the imaginary World of Uanamon’s from the monsters country of rugly. As more children from different parts of Ukraine draw their own characters, the confrontation against the enemies grows stronger.

name: Glam Descent
description: Pictures of beautiful, sexy women are waiting for you. However, players need to respond quickly and accurately to challenge their highest scores and get beautiful pictures

name: MindBloc
description: MindBloc is a puzzle game that tests the player's logical ability, perfect for relaxing, or playing while your computer is loading another game.

name: Obby
description: run, jump, puzzle. Your tasks that you have to master in Obby with Kitty.

name: Dungeon Tale
description: Adventures in the random dungeons, with a AI parters and healers, looting items from ordinary to legendary levels. and after full level, there will be Heroic and Legendary dungeons, or even epic raids of world bosses awaits.

name: Pirate Haven
description: Sail the seas as a pirate captain in this challenging roguelike action adventure game!

name: Stick and Balls
description: Stick and Balls is an exceedingly difficult climb up a minimalist tower. Control two balls, separately yet simultaneously, connected by a stick, with other physics shenanigans that are simple to learn, hard to master. The smallest mistake might lead you on a (psychologically) painful fall.

name: Project Vesperi
description: Discover a sign of life on Venus and determine the fate of humanity in this story-driven, cinematic, branching narrative game.

name: Wild Card Football
description: Wild Card Football is a fun pick-up-and-play arcade-style football game featuring 7v7 team-focused gameplay with the unique Wild Card system that lets you change the course of the action in an instant with special power-ups and rule-breaking abilities.

name: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS
description: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS, one of the variety of war games. Each new level has something new, different effects for shooting, a variety of soldiers, etc. The main goal of this game is to complete the level without leaving a single soldier alive.

name: Scarecrow Co-op 2
description: Cleanse a forest with your friends.

name: The Ultimate Doom
description:
The Ultimate Doom was included in Doom 3 Collector's Edition for the Xbox, which was released in 2005. This port includes an exclusive level, "Sewers". It featured multiplayer like the PC version, however not through Xbox Live. This port was programmed by Vicarious Visions. The Xbox version of Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil also contains this port.

This particular "port" actually appears to be an emulation of the aged DOS version of the game; furthermore, it seems to have been somewhat rushed, as it is somewhat limited in functionality, and has a few bugs and design quirks.

name: Doom II
description: Doom II was included in Doom 3 Collector's Edition for the Xbox, which was released in 2005. This port includes an exclusive level, "Betray". It featured multiplayer like the PC version, however not through Xbox Live. This port was programmed by Vicarious Visions. The Xbox version of Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil also contains this same port, as well as Master Levels for Doom II.
